entries.name: 俯冲攻击
entries: 若你在飞行中且向一个目标直线俯冲至少30尺距离，并接着以一次近战武器攻击命中它，该攻击将对目标造成额外的{@dice 1d6}伤害。

entries.name: 禽爪
entries: 你熟练于你的徒手打击，并在以它命中时造成1d4挥砍伤害。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写气族语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 阿兰寇拉鹰人3岁时成年。相较于人类，阿兰寇拉鹰人通常活不过30岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 阿兰寇拉鹰人大多善良，且鲜少在守序或混乱中选择立场。部族中的领袖与武者可能属于守序，而探险者与冒险者则可能倾向混乱。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 阿兰寇拉鹰人大约5尺高。他们有着体重介于80到100磅之间，纤细而轻盈的身体。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 飞行
entries: 你拥有50尺的飞行速度。要使用此移动速度，你不能穿着中甲或重甲。

entries.name: 禽爪
entries: 你熟练于你的徒手打击，并在命中时造成1d4挥砍伤害。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语、阿兰寇拉语、和气族语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 阿斯莫的成熟速度与人类相同，但可以多活数年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 由于他们的天界血脉，阿斯莫通常是善良的。然而，有些阿斯莫会堕入邪恶，拒绝他们的血脉天性。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 阿斯莫的体格就如同身材匀称的人类一般。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 多亏于你的天界血脉，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 天界抗性
entries: 你具有对黯蚀和光耀伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 天界传承
entries: 你知晓{@spell 光亮术}戏法。当你升至3级，你可以使用此特性施放一次{@spell 次级复原术}，且你在完成一次长休后恢复再次这么做的能力。当你升至5级，你可以使用此特性以3环法术施放一次{@spell 昼明术}，且你在完成一次长休后恢复再次这么做的能力。你施展这些法术的施法属性为魅力。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和天界语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 阿斯莫的成熟速度和人类相同，但他们可以活到最多160岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 由于充盈着天界之力，大部分阿斯莫都是善良的。被放逐的阿斯莫则通常是中立或甚至是邪恶的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 阿斯莫有着与人类相同的身高和体重范围。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 由于受到光耀之魂的祝福，你的视线可以轻易的穿透黑暗。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 天界抗性
entries: 你具有对黯蚀和光耀伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 治愈之手
entries: 以一个动作，你可以触碰一个生物并让它回复等同于你等级的生命值。一旦你使用这个特性，直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 光辉掌者
entries: 你知晓{@spell 光亮术}戏法。你施展这个法术的施法属性为魅力。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和天界语。

entries.name: Necrotic Shroud
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to turn into pools of darkness and two skeletal, ghostly, flightless wings to sprout from your back. The instant you transform, other creatures within 10 feet of you that can see you must succeed on a Charisma saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier) or become {@condition 恐惧} of you until the end of your next turn.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra necrotic damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra necrotic damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing your eyes to glimmer and two luminous, incorporeal wings to sprout from your back.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you have a flying speed of 30 feet, and once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Radiant Consumption
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use your action to unleash the divine energy within yourself, causing a searing light to radiate from you, pour out of your eyes and mouth, and threaten to char you.

Your transformation lasts for 1 minute or until you end it as a bonus action. During it, you shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet, and at the end of each of your turns, you and each creature within 10 feet of you take radiant damage equal to half your level (rounded up). In addition, once on each of your turns, you can deal extra radiant damage to one target when you deal damage to it with an attack or a spell. The extra radiant damage equals your level.
Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Aetherborn come into being as adults and live no more than a few years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: As a rule, aetherborn are driven by hedonism and self-interest, making them neutral at best and thoroughly evil at worst. Neutral aetherborn might devote much of their time (and wealth) to parties and social activity, while evil aetherborn are usually involved in the criminal underworld.

entries.name: Size
entries: Aetherborn are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall. They are quite light—only about 100 pounds—and their weight diminishes as they age and more and more of their substance returns to the aethersphere. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Born of Aether
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 威吓} skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Gift of the Aetherborn
entries: An unknown aetherborn, desperately seeking a means to extend their short life, discovered a process of transformation that prolonged their existence—by giving them the ability to feed on the life essence of other beings. Since then, other aetherborn have learned and carried out this monstrous transformation, and aetherborn with this "gift" have become a small minority among an already small population.

A gifted aetherborn has the ability to drain the life essence of other beings. Similar to the way heat is transferred from a warm object to a cold one, a gifted aetherborn need only touch another living being with a clawed hand to draw life essence out, fueling their own continued existence while draining strength and vitality from their victim.

For many aetherborn, living as they do for indulgence and instant gratification, the concepts of "want" and "need" are virtually synonymous. But Aetherborn with this gift understand what it is to truly need, for they develop a hunger for life essence that far exceeds any desires they might have felt before their transformation. A gifted aetherborn who abstains from this feeding deteriorates even more rapidly than other aetherborn, while enduring unspeakable agony caused by the deprivation of life energy.

At the DM's option, an aetherborn character can research methods of achieving this dark "gift." The process is similar to inventing and manufacturing a rare magic item (see "Inventing and Manufacturing Devices" earlier in this document). But rather than aether, the process requires a variety of rare unguents and unusual ingredients that make up the cost of researching and undergoing the transformation.

An aetherborn with this gift gains the Drain Life ability: a natural attack that deals {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage and restores the same number of hit points to the aetherborn. However, if the aetherborn goes for 7 days without dealing this damage, their hit point maximum is reduced by {@dice 1d6} per week. This reduction can't be removed until the aetherborn has used their Drain Life ability and completed a long rest.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 与人类相似，艾文在近二十岁时成年，且理论上可以活到80岁。当然，他们大部分在那之前便会光荣（或不光彩的）战死。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的艾文倾向属于中立阵营。朱鹭首艾文更崇尚知识胜过其他美德，且通常为绝对中立。鹰首艾文则较为偏向守序中立。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 赛壬的身高约为5到6尺，但他们的身躯相当纤细，骨头部分中空以利飞行。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 飞行
entries: 你拥有30尺的飞行速度。你不能在穿着中甲或重甲时使用你的飞行速度。（如果你的战役使用了负重的变体规则，则你不能在你负载时使用你的飞行速度。）

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和艾文语。

entries.name: Hawkeyed
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill. In addition, attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.

entries.name: Kefnet's Blessing
entries: You can add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any Intelligence check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Age
entries: Like humans, aven reach adulthood in their late teens and can live into their 80s.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Aven are inclined toward the lawful good alignment of the Church of Serra

entries.name: Size
entries: Aven stand from 5 to 6 feet tall, but their bodies are slender and their bones are partially hollow to facilitate their flight. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. You can't use your flying speed while you wear medium or heavy armor. (If your campaign uses the variant rule for encumbrance, you can't use your flying speed if you are encumbered.)

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aven.

entries.name: Hawkeyed
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill. In addition, attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.

entries.name: Age
entries: Bugbears reach adulthood at age 16 and live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Bugbears live on the fringes of society even in Darguun, where they value self-sufficiency and violence. They are generally chaotic, organizing in loose tribes under charismatic and powerful leaders.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Long-Limbed
entries: When you make a melee attack on your turn, your reach for it is 5 feet greater than normal.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Sneaky
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill 隐匿} skill.

entries.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra {@dice 2d6} damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 熊地精在16岁时成年，且可以活最多80年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 熊地精长期所忍受的恶劣环境，要求每个人自给自足，即使必须要牺牲他们的同胞也一样。他们倾向于混乱邪恶。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 熊地精的身高介于6到8尺之间，且体重介于250到350磅。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 长肢
entries: 当你在你的回合进行一次近战攻击时，你的触及范围对该攻击而言视作比原本长5尺。

entries.name: 强健体格
entries: 当决定你的负重以及你可以拖曳、推动、或提举的重量时，你将你的体型视作比原本大一级。

entries.name: 鬼祟
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 隐匿}技能。

entries.name: 突袭攻击
entries: 若你突袭一个生物并在你战斗中的第一个回合以一次攻击命中它，则该攻击将对它造成额外的2d6伤害。你每场战斗只能使用此特性一次。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和地精语。

entries.name: 两栖
entries: 你可以在空气和水中呼吸。

entries.name: 蛙类交谈
entries: 你可以使用狂蛙人语对青蛙与蟾蜍进行简单概念的沟通。

entries.name: 沼泽伪装
entries: 你在沼泽地形为躲藏所进行的敏捷（{@skill 隐匿}）检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 立定跳跃
entries: 你的跳远距离最多20尺、且跳高距离最多10尺，无论有没有助跑都一样。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写狂蛙人语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 半人马成年跟寿命的速度皆和人类差不多。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 半人马倾向中立。那些加入瑟雷尼亚的半人马通常是中立善良，而那些加入古鲁的半人马则大多为混乱中立。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 半人马站立的高度介于6尺到7尺之间，他们马身的高度则约为4尺。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 精类
entries: 你的生物类型是精类生物，而非类人生物。

entries.name: 冲锋
entries: 若你朝着目标直线移动至少30尺并接着以近战武器在同一回合命中它，你可以立刻在该攻击后以一个附赠动作，使用你的马蹄对目标进行一次攻击。

entries.name: 马蹄
entries: 你的马蹄是天生近战武器，你可以使用它们来进行徒手打击。如果你以它们命中目标，则你造成等同1d4 + 你的力量调整值的钝击伤害，而不是一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 马之身躯
entries: 当决定你的负重以及你可以拖曳或推动的重量时，你将你的体型视作比原本大一级。
此外，因为你的马腿，任何需要手和脚的攀爬对你来说都特别困难。当你进行这攀爬时，每移动1尺都会额外消耗你4尺的移动速度，而非原本的额外1尺移动速度。

entries.name: 生存者
entries: 你熟练于以下其中一个你所选择的技能{@skill 驯兽}、{@skill 医疗}、{@skill 自然}或{@skill 生存}。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和木族语。木族语因为有着丰富的词汇去描述自然现象跟精神力量，而在瑟雷尼亚中被广泛地使用。

items.name: Alignment
entries: Centaurs are inclined toward neutrality. Lagonna centaurs tend to be more lawful, while Pheres centaurs are more often chaotic.

items.name: Size
entries: Centaurs stand between 6 and 7 feet tall, with their equine bodies reaching about 4 feet at the withers. Pheres centaurs tend to be slightly larger than Lagonna centaurs. Your size is Medium.

items.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

entries.name: Age
entries: Centaurs mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Centaurs are inclined toward neutrality.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium, yet you tower over most other humanoids.

entries.name: Charge
entries: If you move at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, roll the weapon's damage dice twice and add them together. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Hooves
entries: Your hooves are natural melee weapons, with which you're proficient. If you hit with a hoof, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Equine Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push or drag. In addition, any climb that requires hands and feet is especially difficult for you because of your hooves. When you make such a climb, each foot of movement costs you 4 extra feet, instead of the normal 1 extra foot. Finally, a Medium or smaller creature can ride on your equine back if you allow it. In such a situation, you continue to act independently, not as a controlled mount.

entries.name: Survivor
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 生存} skill.

entries.name: Hybrid Nature
entries: You have two creature types: humanoid and monstrosity. You can be affected by a game effect if it works on either of your creature types.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

entries.name: Age
entries: Changelings mature slightly faster than humans but share a similar lifespan—typically a century or less. While a changeling can transform to conceal their age, the effects of aging affect them similarly to humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Changelings tend toward pragmatic neutrality, and few changelings embrace evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries: As an action, you can change your appearance and your voice. You determine the specifics of the changes, including your coloration, hair length, and sex. You can also adjust your height and weight, but not so much that your size changes. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your game statistics change. You can't duplicate the appearance of a creature you've never seen, and you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs that you have. Your clothing and equipment aren't changed by this trait.
You stay in the new form until you use an action to revert to your true form or until you die.

entries.name: Changeling Instincts
entries: You gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill 欺瞒}, {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 威吓}, and {@skill 说服}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Size
entries: Changelings are built much like humans, but a little leaner. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Duplicity
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 欺瞒} skill.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries: As an action, you can polymorph into any humanoid of your size that you have seen, or back into your true form. However, your equipment does not change with you. If you die, you revert to your natural appearance.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Changelings mature slightly faster than humans but share a similar lifespan—typically a century or less. While a changeling can shapeshift to conceal their age, the effects of aging still catch up to them.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Changelings hate to be bound in any way, and those who follow the path of the Traveler believe that chaos and change are important aspects of life. Most tend toward pragmatic neutrality as opposed to being concerned with lofty ideals. Few changelings embrace evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: In their natural forms, changelings average between 5 and 6 feet in height, with a slender build. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Change Appearance
entries: As an action, you can transform your appearance or revert to your natural form. You can't duplicate the appearance of a creature you've never seen, and you revert to your natural form if you die.

You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, the sound of your voice, coloration, hair length, sex, and any other distinguishing characteristics. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your game statistics change. You also can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same; if you're bipedal, you can't use this trait to become quadrupedal, for instance. Your clothing and other equipment don't change in appearance, size, or shape to match your new form, requiring you to keep a few extra outfits on hand to make the most compelling disguise possible.

Even to the most astute observers, your ruse is usually indiscernible. If you rouse suspicion, or if a wary creature suspects something is amiss, you have advantage on any Charisma ({@skill 欺瞒}) check you make to avoid detection.

entries.name: Changeling Instincts
entries: You gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill 欺瞒}, {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 威吓}, or {@skill 说服}

entries.name: Unsettling Visage
entries: When a creature you can see makes an attack roll against you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the roll. You must use this feature before knowing whether the attack hits or misses. Using this trait reveals your shapeshifting nature to any creature within 30 feet that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Divergent Persona
entries: You gain proficiency with one {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice. Define a persona associated with that proficiency: establish the name, race, gender, age, and other details. While you are in the form of this persona, the related proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses that proficiency.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and two other languages of your choice.

race.name: 自定血统
entries: 在1级时，你可以选择不使用游戏中已有的种族，而是使用以下特性定制角色的血统，让你可以完全自定角色的出身：

entries.name: 生物类型
entries: 类人生物。由你自己决定的外貌，以及你是否与同族长相类似。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 从小型或中型中选择一个。

entries.name: 专长
entries: 你选择一个满足条件的{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

entries.name: 可选特征
entries: 从以下两种特性中选择一个：(a) 60尺{@sense 黑暗视觉} 或 (b) 一个你选择的技能熟练项。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和另一门你和你的DM认为适合你的角色的语言。

items.name: Type:
items.entry: Humanoid and Undead

items.name: Size:
items.entry: Medium or Small (choose when you gain this lineage)

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.

entries.name: Spider Climb
entries: You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed. In addition, at 3rd level, you can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free.

entries.name: Vampiric Bite
entries: Your fanged bite is a natural weapon, which counts as a simple melee weapon with which you are proficient. You add your Constitution modifier to the attack and damage rolls when you attack with your bite. Your bite deals {@dice 1d4} piercing damage on a hit. While you are missing half or more of your hit points, you have advantage on attack rolls you make with this bite.
When you use your bite and hit a creature that isn't a Construct or an Undead, you can empower yourself in one of the following ways of your choice:

items: regain hit points equal to the damage dealt by the bite
gain a bonus to the next ability check or attack roll you make; the bonus equals the damage dealt by the bite

entries: You can empower yourself with your bite a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 年幼的龙裔成长速度很快。他们在孵化后几个小时后就会步行，在3岁的时候就达到人类10岁孩童的体型和发育程度，并在15岁时成年。他们可以活到大约80岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 龙裔的阵营趋向极端，在善与恶的无尽战争中（各自代表巴哈姆特和提亚玛特）有意识的选择加入其中一边。大部分的龙裔是善良的，但那些选择站在提亚玛特那一边的龙裔则会是可怕的恶棍。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 龙裔比人类更高更重，他们在站立时远超过6尺高，且有着平均250磅的体重。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 龙族血统
entries: 你拥有龙族的血统。从龙族血统表中选择一个龙种。你的喷吐武器和伤害抗性将会由你所选的龙种而决定，如表所示。

entries.name: 喷吐武器
entries: 你可以使用你的动作以呼出毁灭性的能量。你的龙族血统决定了这个吐息的尺寸、形状、以及伤害类型。
当你使用你的喷吐武器时，每个在吐息范围内的生物都必须进行一次豁免检定，其豁免属行由你的龙族血统决定。这个豁免检定的DC等同于8 + 你的体质调整值 + 你的熟练加值。一个豁免失败的生物将受到{@dice 2d6}伤害，豁免成功则只受到一半的伤害。这个伤害将在你的等级升至6级时增加至{@dice 3d6}，11级时{@dice 4d6}，以及16级时{@dice 5d6}。
在你使用你的喷吐武器之后，直到完成一次短休或长休之前，你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 伤害抗性
entries: 你具有与你龙族血统相应伤害类型的抗性。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和龙语。龙语被认为是最古老的语言之一，且在魔法研究中经常被使用。龙语对大部分其他生物而言听起来非常刺耳，而且包含了很多硬辅音和咝声擦音。

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Forceful Presence
entries: You can use your understanding of creative diplomacy or intimidation to guide a conversation in your favor. When you make a Charisma ({@skill 威吓} or {@skill 说服}) check, you can do so with advantage. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Draconic Ancestry
entries: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon is determined by the dragon type, as shown in the table.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Vengeful Assault
entries: When you take damage from a creature in range of a weapon you are wielding, you can use your reaction to make an attack with the weapon against that creature. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Draconic Ancestry
entries: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon is determined by the dragon type, as shown in the table.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 矮人的成熟速度和人类相同，但他们直到50岁之前都会被视作未成年。他们平均可以活大约350年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的矮人是守序的，坚信着井然有序的社会所带来的好处。他们也倾向善良，有着强烈的公平竞争意识，并认为每个人都应该共享公正秩序的益处。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 矮人的身高介于4到5尺高，且平均大约150磅重。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 移动速度
entries: 你的移动速度并不会因为穿着重甲而减少。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 习惯了地底的生活，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。 你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 矮人韧性
entries: 你在对抗毒素的豁免检定中具有优势，且你对毒素伤害具有抗性。

entries.name: 矮人战斗训练
entries: 你熟练于{@item 战斧|phb}、{@item 手斧|phb}、{@item 轻锤|phb}、和{@item 战锤|phb}。

entries.name: 工具熟练
entries: 你熟练于下列其中一个你所选择的工匠工具：{@item 铁匠工具|phb}、{@item 酿酒工具|phb}或{@item 泥瓦匠工具|phb}。

entries.name: 岩石熟悉
entries: 每当你进行关联于石制品起源的智力（{@skill 历史}）检定时，你被视为熟练于{@skill 历史}技能，并将你二倍的熟练加值代替你原本的熟练加值加入该检定中。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和矮人语。矮人语充斥了坚硬的辅音和喉音，而这些特征也将显露在任何矮人可能会说的其他语言中。

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Duergar Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage. You also have advantage on saving throws against illusions and against being {@condition 魅惑} or {@condition 麻痹}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Dwarvish, and Undercommon.

entries.name: Duergar Magic
entries: When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 变巨/缩小术} spell on yourself once with this trait, using only the spell's enlarge option. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 隐形术} spell on yourself once with this trait. You don't need material components for either spell, and you can't cast them while you're in direct sunlight, although sunlight has no effect on them once cast. You regain the ability to cast these spells with this trait when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Warder's Intuition
entries: When you make an Intelligence ({@skill 调查}) check or an ability check using {@item 盗贼工具|phb}, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Wards and Seals
entries: You can cast the {@spell 警报术} and {@spell 法师护甲} spells with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the {@spell 秘法锁} spell with it. Once you cast any of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells, and you don't need material components for them when you cast them with this trait.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Warding Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Warding Spells
rows: {@spell 警报术}, {@spell 艾嘉西斯之铠}
{@spell 守卫铭文}, {@spell 防护法阵}
{@spell 李欧蒙秘藏箱}, {@spell 魔邓肯忠犬}

entries.name: Dwarven Armor Training
entries: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dwarves mature at the same rate as humans, but they're considered young until they reach the age of 50. On average, they live about 350 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most dwarves are lawful, believing firmly in the benefits of a well-ordered society. They tend toward good as well, with a strong sense of fair play and a belief that everyone deserves to share in the benefits of a just order.

entries.name: Size
entries: Dwarves stand around 5 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your speed is not reduced by wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground in your race's ancient past, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

entries.name: Dwarven Toughness
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Artisan's Expertise
entries: You gain proficiency with two kinds of {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools} of your choice. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies. In addition, whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill 历史}) check related to the origin of any architectural construction (including buildings, public works such as canals and aqueducts, and the massive cogwork that underlies much of the construction of Ghirapur), you are considered proficient in the {@skill 历史} skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Dwarvish. Dwarvish is full of hard consonants and guttural sounds, and those characteristics spill over into whatever other language a dwarf might speak.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 尽管精灵和人类会在差不多的年龄达到生理成熟，但精灵对成年的见解并不只是生理成熟，还包括世俗的经验。精灵通常在100岁前后声明成年并得到成年名称，且其寿命可达750岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 精灵热爱自由、多元、和自我表现，因此他们强烈倾向于较温和的混乱。他们将他人的自由当作自己的来重视与保护。他们通常都是善良的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 精灵的身高范围从不到五尺到超过六尺，且有着苗条的体格。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 习惯了微光森林与夜空，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。 你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 敏锐感官
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 察觉}技能。

entries.name: 精类血统
entries: 你在对抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免检定中具有优势，且魔法无法让你入睡。

entries.name: 传思
entries: 精灵并不需要睡眠。取而代之，他们一天会进行4小时保留潜意识的深度冥想。（通用语将这种冥想称为"传思"）在冥想时，你勉强算是会作梦；这些梦境实际上是在多年训练下产生的反射性心灵锻炼。在以这种方式休息后，你得到与人类8小时睡眠后相同的益处。
{@note 如果你在长休期间冥想，你可以在花费4小时完成冥想后，在剩下的4小时中保持清醒，并进行轻省活动。你仍然需要花费8小时来完成长休。}

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和精灵语。精灵语如流体般流畅，有着精妙的语调制化和复杂的语法结构。精灵文学丰富而多元，他们的诗歌在其他种族之间也很受欢迎。许多吟游诗人都会学习精灵语，并将其韵律运用在他们自己的诗作中。

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Auran.

entries.name: Flight
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to the depths of the Underdark, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Drow Magic
entries: You know the {@spell 舞光术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 妖火术} spell once per day; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell 黑暗术} spell once per day; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Drow Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with {@item rapier|phb|rapiers}, {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords}, and {@item hand crossbow|phb|hand crossbows}.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fey Step
entries: You can cast the {@spell 迷踪步} spell once using this trait. You regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest.

subraces.name: 雅灵
entries: {@i Choose your eladrin's season: autumn, winter, spring, or summer. When finishing a long rest, any eladrin can change their season. See the "Info" tab for more information.}

entries.name: Fey Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
When you reach 3rd level, your Fey Step gains an additional effect based on your season; if the effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier:

items.name: Autumn
items.entry: Immediately after you use your Fey Step, up to two creatures of your choice that you can see within 10 feet of you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition 魅惑} by you for 1 minute, or until you or your companions deal any damage to it.

items.name: Winter
items.entry: When you use your Fey Step, one creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you before you teleport must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition 恐惧} of you until the end of your next turn.

items.name: Spring
items.entry: When you use your Fey Step, you can touch one willing creature within 5 feet of you. That creature then teleports instead of you, appearing in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within 30 feet of you.

items.name: Summer
items.entry: Immediately after you use your Fey Step, each creature of your choice that you can see within 5 feet of you takes fire damage equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum of 1 damage).

entries.name: Fey Step
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Shifting Seasons
entries: At the end of each short or long rest, you can align yourself with the magic of one season, regardless of the season that is dominating your personality. Doing so allows you to cast a certain cantrip, as shown in the Shifting Seasons Cantrips table. When you align yourself with a season's magic, you lose the cantrip associated with the previous season and gain the cantrip associated with the new season.
Your spellcasting ability for these cantrips is Intelligence or Charisma, whichever is higher.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Sylvan, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

entries.name: Grugach Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item spear|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, {@item longbow|phb}, and {@item net|phb}.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|class=druid|level=0}. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one {@filter cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choosing.

entries.name: Aereni Training
entries: Choose one skill or {@book tool|phb|5|tools} proficiency. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses this chosen proficiency.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one {@filter cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choosing.

entries.name: Valenar Weapon Training
entries: A Valenar elf gains proficiency with the {@item scimitar|phb}, {@item Double-Bladed Scimitar|erlw|double scimitar}, {@item longbow|phb}, and {@item shortbow|phb}.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one {@filter cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list|spells|level=0|class=Wizard}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choosing.

entries.name: Cunning Intuition
entries: When you make a Charisma ({@skill 表演}) or Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Shape Shadows
entries: You know the {@spell 次级幻象} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 隐形术} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Shadow Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.name: Incisive Sense
entries: You have advantage on Intelligence ({@skill 调查}) and Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) checks.

entries.name: Blessing of the Moon Weaver
entries: You know the {@spell 光亮术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 睡眠术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 隐形术} spell (targeting yourself only) once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Casting these spells with this trait doesn't require material components. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Sea Elf Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item spear|phb}, {@item trident|phb}, {@item light crossbow|phb}, and {@item net|phb}.

entries.name: Child of the Sea
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan.

entries.name: Sea Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item spear|phb}, {@item trident|phb}, {@item light crossbow|phb}, and {@item net|phb}.

entries.name: Child of the Sea
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet, and you can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts that have an inborn swimming speed.

entries.name: Necrotic Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

Starting at 3rd level, you also gain resistance to all damage when you teleport using this trait. The resistance lasts until the start of your next turn. During that time, you appear ghostly and translucent.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice. Elvish is fluid, with subtle intonations and intricate grammar. Elven literature is rich and varied, and their songs and poems are famous among other races. Many bards learn their language so they can add Elvish ballads to their repertoires.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one of the following cantrips of your choice: {@spell 寒颤之触}, {@spell 拯救濒死}, or {@spell 奇术}. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Blessing of the Raven Queen
entries: As a bonus action, you can magically teleport up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space you can see, and you gain resistance to all damage until the start of your next turn. During that time, you appear ghostly and translucent. Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: Aereni Training
entries: Choose one skill or {@book tool|phb|5|tools} proficiency. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses this chosen proficiency.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: Valenar Weapon Training
entries: A Valenar elf gains proficiency with the {@item scimitar|phb}, {@item Double-Bladed Scimitar|erlw|double scimitar}, {@item longbow|phb}, and {@item shortbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries: 尽管精灵和人类会在差不多的年龄达到生理成熟，但精灵对成年的见解并不只是生理成熟，还包括世俗的经验。精灵通常在100岁前后声明成年并得到成年名称，且其寿命可达750岁。

entries: 精灵热爱自由、多元、和自我表现，因此他们强烈倾向于较温和的混乱。他们将他人的自由当作自己的来重视与保护。他们通常都是善良的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 精灵的身高范围从不到五尺到超过六尺，且有着苗条的体格。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 习惯了微光森林与夜空，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。 你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 敏锐感官
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 察觉}技能。

entries.name: 精灵武器训练
entries: 你熟练于{@item 长剑|phb}、{@item 短剑|phb}、{@item 短弓|phb}、和{@item 长弓|phb}。

entries.name: 精类血统
entries: 你在对抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免检定中具有优势，且魔法无法让你入睡。

entries.name: 传思
entries: 精灵并不需要睡眠。取而代之，他们一天会进行4小时保留潜意识的深度冥想。（通用语将这种冥想称为"传思"）在冥想时，你勉强算是会作梦；这些梦境实际上是在多年训练下产生的反射性心灵锻炼。在以这种方式休息后，你得到与人类8小时睡眠后相同的益处。
{@note 如果你在长休期间冥想，你可以在花费4小时完成冥想后，在剩下的4小时中保持清醒，并进行轻省活动。你仍然需要花费8小时来完成长休。}

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和精灵语。精灵语如流体般流畅，有着精妙的语调制化和复杂的语法结构。精灵文学丰富而多元，他们的诗歌在其他种族之间也很受欢迎。许多吟游诗人都会学习精灵语，并将其韵律运用在他们自己的诗作中。

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your ground speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|class=druid|level=0}. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Extra Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write one extra language of your choosing.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 尽管精灵和人类会在差不多的年龄达到生理成熟，但精灵对成年的见解并不只是生理成熟，还包括世俗的经验。精灵通常在100岁前后声明成年并得到成年名称，且其寿命可达750岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 精灵热爱自由、多元、和自我表现，因此他们强烈倾向于较温和的混乱。他们将他人的自由当作自己的来重视与保护。他们通常都是善良的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 精灵的身高范围从不到五尺到超过六尺，且有着苗条的体格。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 习惯了微光森林与夜空，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。 你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 敏锐感官
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 察觉}技能。

entries.name: 精类血统
entries: 你在对抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免检定中具有优势，且魔法无法让你入睡。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和精灵语。精灵语如流体般流畅，有着精妙的语调制化和复杂的语法结构。精灵文学丰富而多元，他们的诗歌在其他种族之间也很受欢迎。许多吟游诗人都会学习精灵语，并将其韵律运用在他们自己的诗作中。

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your ground speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mul Daya Magic
entries: You know the {@spell 寒颤之触} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 脆弱诅咒} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 黑暗术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Your Darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You have proficiency with any combination of two other skills or {@book tools|phb|5|tools} of your choice.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: You are a Fey.

entries.name: Fairy Flight
entries: You have a flying speed equal to your walking speed and can hover. This flight is magical and does not require the use of your wings (if you have them).

entries.name: Fairy Magic
entries: You know the {@spell druidcraft} and {@spell faerie fire} spells. You can cast faerie fire without expending a spell slot, and you must finish a long rest before you can cast it this way again. You can also cast this spell using any spell slots you have. Your spellcasting ability for these spells is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

entries.name: Fey Passage
entries: You can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 做为与精类有关的类人生物，费尔伯格有着悠长的寿命。一个费尔伯格在大约30岁左右成年，且他们之中最年长的可以活到500岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 做为遵循自然节奏之人，并将自己视为自然的照顾者，费尔伯格通常是守序善良。邪恶的费尔伯格相当罕见，且通常会是他们同胞的死敌。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 费尔伯格的身高介于7到8尺，且体重介于240到300磅之间。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 费尔伯格魔法
entries: 你可以使用此特性施放{@spell 侦测魔法}和{@spell 易容术}，使用感知做为你施放它们的施法属性。一旦你施放其中一个法术，直到你完成一次短休或长休之前你都不能再施放它。当你使用这个版本的{@spell 易容术}时，你可以让自己看起来比原本再矮3尺，使你更容易融入人类和精灵之中。

entries.name: 神隐步
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以用魔法变得{@condition 隐形}直到你的下个回合开始，或直到你攻击、掷伤害骰，或强迫某人进行一次豁免检定。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或长休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 强健体格
entries: 当决定你的负重以及你可以拖曳、推动、或提举的重量时，你将你的体型视作比原本大一级。

entries.name: 兽与叶之语
entries: 你拥有与野兽和植物以有限方式进行沟通的能力。它们可以理解你话语的意思，然而你并没有特殊能力以理解牠们的回复。你在用于影响它们所进行的所有魅力检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语、精灵语、和巨人语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 元素裔以和人类差不多的速度成熟，并在十多岁左右成人。他们活得比人类更久一点，最多到120岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 独立而自信，元素裔倾向中立阵营。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 元素裔的体型和他们的凡人父母一样各有不同，但其体格通常与人类相似，直立身高从5尺到6尺以上。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语以及原初语。原初语是一种喉音语言，充满短促的音节和生硬的辅音。

entries.name: Unending Breath
entries: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you're not {@condition 无力}.

entries.name: Mingle with the Wind
entries: You can cast the {@spell 浮空术} spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Earth Walk
entries: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

entries.name: Merge with Stone
entries: You can cast the {@spell 行踪无迹} spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. Your ties to the Elemental Plane of Fire make your darkvision unusual: everything you see in darkness is in a shade of red.

entries.name: Fire Resistance
entries: You have resistance to fire damage.

entries.name: Reach to the Blaze
entries: You know the {@spell 燃火术} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 燃烧之手} spell once with this trait as a 1st-level spell, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Acid Resistance
entries: You have resistance to acid damage.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Swim
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Call to the Wave
entries: You know the {@spell shape water|xge} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 造水/枯水术} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 吉斯人在近二十岁时成年，且可活约一个世纪。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 吉斯人相较人类而言更高而纤瘦，身高大多为6尺。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和吉斯语。

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Githyanki tend toward lawful evil. They are aggressive and arrogant, and they remain the faithful servants of their lich-queen, Vlaakith. Renegade githyanki tend toward chaos.

entries.name: Decadent Mastery
entries: You learn one language of your choice, and you are proficient with one skill or {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice. In the timeless city of Tu'narath, githyanki have bountiful time to master odd bits of knowledge.

entries.name: Martial Prodigy
entries: You are proficient with light and medium armor and with {@item shortsword|phb|shortswords}, {@item longsword|phb|longswords}, and {@item greatsword|phb|greatswords}.

entries.name: Githyanki Psionics
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip, and the hand is {@condition 隐形} when you cast the cantrip with this trait.

When you reach 3rd level, you can cast {@spell 跳跃术} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 迷踪步} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. When you cast them with this trait, they don't require components.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Githzerai tend toward lawful neutral. Their rigorous training in psychic abilities requires an implacable mental discipline.

entries.name: Mental Discipline
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against the {@condition 魅惑} and {@condition 恐惧} conditions. Under the tutelage of monastic masters, githzerai learn to govern their own minds.

entries.name: Githzerai Psionics
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip, and the hand is {@condition 隐形} when you cast the cantrip with this trait.

When you reach 3rd level, you can cast {@spell 护盾术} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 侦测思想} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells. When you cast them with this trait, they don't require components.

entries.name: Age
entries: Gith reach adulthood in their late teens and live for about a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Gith are taller and leaner than humans, with most a slender 6 feet in height.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gith.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Githyanki tend toward lawful evil. They are self-centered, violent, and arrogant, yet they remain the faithful servants of their lich-queen, Vlaakith. Renegade githyanki tend toward chaos as they have forsaken her will.

entries.name: Decadent Mastery
entries: You learn one language of your choice, and you are proficient with one skill or {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice. In the timeless city of Tu'narath, githyanki have bountiful time to master odd bits of knowledge.

entries.name: Martial Prodigy
entries: You are proficient with light and medium armor. Your people are ever ready for war.

entries.name: Githyanki Psionics
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast {@spell 跳跃术} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 迷踪步} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells. You can cast all of them without components.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Githzerai tend toward lawful neutral. Their rigorous training in psychic abilities requires an implacable mental discipline.

entries.name: Monastic Training
entries: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you aren't wearing medium or heavy armor and aren't using a shield. All githzerai receive basic training from monks, and the monks among them are unmatched in their defensive abilities.

entries.name: Githzerai Psionics
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast {@spell 护盾术} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 侦测思想} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest.
Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells. You can cast all of them without components.

entries.name: 啃咬
entries: 你长满獠牙的血盆大口是一种天生武器，且你可以用它来进行徒手打击。如果你以它命中目标，则你造成等同1d4 + 你的力量调整值的穿刺伤害，而非一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 暴走
entries: 当你在你的回合以一次近战攻击将一个生物的生命值归零，你可以采取一个附赠动作以移动最多等同于你移动速度一半的距离，并进行一次啃咬攻击。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 侏儒的成熟速度和人类相同，且大部分会被预计在40岁左右安定下来进入成年的生活。他们可以活到350岁到接近500岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 侏儒大部分都是善良的。那些贤者、工程师、研究者、学者、调查者、或发明家倾向于守序，而那些吟游诗人、骗徒、流浪汉、或是富幻想的珠宝匠则倾向于混乱。侏儒的心地善良，甚至他们之中的那些骗徒也多是玩笑性质，而不是真正带有恶意。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 侏儒的身高范围在3尺到4尺之间，且平均约40磅重。你的体型为小型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 习惯了地底的生活，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。 你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 侏儒狡黠
entries: 你在所有对抗魔法的智力、感知、和魅力豁免中具有优势。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和侏儒语。侏儒语是一种使用矮人文本的语言，并以其技术论文和对自然世界的知识分类而闻名。

entries.name: Age
entries: Deep gnomes are short-lived for gnomes. They mature at the same rate humans do and are considered full-grown adults by 25. They live 200 to 250 years, although hard toil and the dangers of the Underdark often claim them before their time.

entries.name: Size
entries: Unlike other gnomes, svirfneblin tend to weigh 80 to 120 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Svirfneblin believe that survival depends on avoiding entanglements with other creatures and not making enemies, so they favor neutral alignments. They rarely wish others ill, and they are unlikely to take risks on behalf of others, except those dearest to them.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Gnomish, and Undercommon.

entries.name: Age
entries: Deep gnomes are short-lived for gnomes. They mature at the same rate humans do and are considered full-grown adults by 25. They live 200 to 250 years, although hard toil and the dangers of the Underdark often claim them before their time.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Svirfneblin believe that survival depends on avoiding entanglements with other creatures and not making enemies, so they favor neutral alignments. They rarely wish others ill, and they are unlikely to take risks on behalf of others.

entries.name: Size
entries: A typical svirfneblin stands about 3 to 3½ feet tall and weighs 80 to 120 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Accustomed to life underground, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Gnomish, and Undercommon. The svirfneblin dialect is more guttural than surface Gnomish, and most svirfneblin know only a little bit of Common, but those who deal with outsiders (and that includes you as an adventurer) pick up enough Common to get by in other lands.

entries.name: Natural Illusionist
entries: You know the {@spell 次级幻象} cantrip. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Speak with Small Beasts
entries: Through sounds and gestures, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts. Forest gnomes love animals and often keep squirrels, badgers, rabbits, moles, woodpeckers, and other creatures as beloved pets.

entries.name: Gifted Scribe
entries: When you make an Intelligence ({@skill 历史}) check or an ability check using {@item 书法工具|PHB}, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Scribe's Insight
entries: You know the {@spell 传讯术} cantrip. You can also cast {@spell 通晓语言} once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a short or long rest. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 魔嘴术} spell with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Scribing Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Scribing Spells
rows: {@spell 通晓语言}, {@spell 迷幻手稿}

entries.name: Artificer's Lore
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill 历史}) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices, you can add twice your proficiency bonus, instead of any proficiency bonus you normally apply.

entries.name: Tinker
entries: You have proficiency with artisan's tools ({@item 修理工具|phb}). Using those tools, you can spend 1 hour and 10 gp worth of materials to construct a Tiny clockwork device (AC 5, 1 hp). The device ceases to function after 24 hours (unless you spend 1 hour repairing it to keep the device functioning), or when you use your action to dismantle it; at that time, you can reclaim the materials used to create it. You can have up to three such devices active at a time.
When you create a device, choose one of the following options:

entries.name: Clockwork Toy
entries: This toy is a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such as a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or soldier. When placed on the ground, the toy moves 5 feet across the ground on each of your turns in a random direction. It makes noises as appropriate to the creature it represents.

entries.name: Fire Starter
entries: The device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.

entries.name: Music Box
entries: When opened, this music box plays a single song at a moderate volume. The box stops playing when it reaches the song's end or when it is closed.

entries.name: 天生施法
entries: 你天生就具备施放以下法术的能力，且无需任何材料构材：

items.name: 随意:
items.entry: {@spell 回避侦测}(限定自身)

items.name: 各项1/每日:
items.entry: {@spell 目盲/耳聋术}, {@spell 朦胧术}, {@spell 易容术}

entries: 你施展这些法术的施法属性为智力。

entries.name: 侏儒狡黠
entries: 你在所有对抗魔法的智力、感知、和魅力豁免中具有优势。

entries.name: 高级黑暗视觉
entries: 习惯了地底的生活，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你120尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语、侏儒语、土族语、和地底通用语。

entries.name: 灵敏脱逃
entries: 你可以在每次你的回合以一个附赠动作来采取{@action 撤离}或{@action 躲藏}动作。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和地精语。

items.name: Alignment
entries: In Eberron, goblins are usually neutral. They tend to look out for themselves, preferably without drawing unwanted attention from any larger, more powerful people.

items.name: Size
entries: Your size is Small.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Goblins are typically neutral evil, as they care only for their own needs. A few goblins might tend toward good or neutrality, but only rarely.

items.name: Age
entries: Goblins reach adulthood around age 8. They age noticeably faster than humans, and though few goblins live to old age, the most cautious rarely live longer than 60 years.

items.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin. In Ravnica, Goblin is a simplistic language with a limited vocabulary and fluid rules of grammar, unsuited for any sophisticated conversation.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 地精大约在八岁左右成年。他们的年纪成长明显快于人类，且尽管很少能有地精活到老年，但最谨慎小心的地精也很少能活超过60岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分在拉尼卡的地精属于混乱阵营，但并不特别偏向善良或邪恶。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 地精的身高介于3尺至4尺高，体重则介于40磅至80磅之间。你的体型为小型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 小个子怒火
entries: 当你以一次攻击或法术伤害了一个体型比你大的生物时，你可以让该攻击或法术对该生物造成额外的伤害。这个额外伤害等同于你的等级。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或长休之前都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 灵敏脱逃
entries: 你可以在每次你的回合以一个附赠动作来采取{@action 撤离}或{@action 躲藏}动作。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和地精语。在拉尼卡，地精语是一种辞汇有限、不固定文法的简单语言，不适合用来进行复杂的对话。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 地精大约在八岁左右成年，且可以活最多60年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 由于他们只在乎自己的需求，地精通常会是守序邪恶。少部分地精可能会倾向善良或中立，但这相当罕见。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 地精的身高介于3尺至4尺高，体重则介于40磅至80磅之间。你的体型为小型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 小个子怒火
entries: 当你以一次攻击或法术伤害了一个体型比你大的生物时，你可以让该攻击或法术对该生物造成额外的伤害。这个额外伤害等同于你的等级。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或长休之前都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 灵敏脱逃
entries: 你可以在每次你的回合以一个附赠动作来采取{@action 撤离}或{@action 躲藏}动作。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和地精语。

items.name: Alignment
entries: Dankwood goblins are typically neutral or neutral good, though some mischievous dankwood goblins are chaotic neutral.

items.name: Speak with Small Beasts
entries: Through sounds and gestures, you can communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts. Dankwood goblins love animals and often keep squirrels, badgers, rabbits, moles, woodpeckers, and other creatures as beloved pets.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins mature faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 12. They age noticeably faster, and though few goblins live to old age, the most cautious rarely live longer than 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most goblins are wildly chaotic, with no particular inclination toward good or evil but a strong tendency toward mischief.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goblins average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Agile Climber
entries: You have a climbing speed of 25 feet. You can't use your climbing speed while you wear medium or heavy armor. (If your campaign uses the variant rule for encumbrance, you can't use your climbing speed if you are encumbered.)

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common (if it exists in your campaign) and Goblin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins mature faster than humans, reaching adulthood at around age 12. They also age noticeably faster than humans, and even the most cautious goblins rarely live longer than 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most goblins are wildly chaotic, though they have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goblins average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Grit
entries: You have resistance to fire damage and psychic damage. In addition, when you are wearing no armor, your AC is equal to 11 + your Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Grotag Tamer
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 驯兽} skill.

entries.name: Lavastep Grit
entries: You have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill 隐匿}) checks made to hide in rocky or subterranean environments.

entries.name: Tuktuk Cunning
entries: You have proficiency with {@item 盗贼工具|phb}.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 歌利亚的寿命和人类差不多。他们在在近二十岁时成年，且通常活不到一个世纪。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 歌利亚的社会有着明确的角色跟职责，具有相当强烈的守序倾向。歌利亚的公平意识以及强调着自给自足和个人责任互相平衡，则将他们推向中立。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 歌利亚介于7到8尺高，且体重介于280到340磅。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 天生运动员
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 运动}技能。

entries.name: 石之耐性
entries: 你可以通过专注自身以忽视重伤。当你受到伤害时，你可以使用你的反应以骰一颗{@dice 1d12}。将你的体质调整值加入骰出的数字，并将该伤害减少其总和的数值。在你使用此特性之后，直到完成一次短休或长休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 强健体格
entries: 当决定你的负重以及你可以拖曳、推动、或提举的重量时，你将你的体型视作比原本大一级。

entries.name: 高山之子
entries: 你已习惯于高海拔的环境，包括海拔高度20,000尺以上的环境。你也天生适应了寒冷的温度，参见《地下城主指南》第五章的叙述。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和巨人语。

entries.name: 盲视
entries: 你没有双眼，且不会陷入{@condition 目盲}状态。你可以察觉你周遭30尺范围内的环境，或在{@condition 耳聋}时则为10尺范围。你对超过这个半径范围外的事物被视作{@condition 目盲}。

entries.name: 敏锐听觉和嗅觉
entries: 你在依赖听觉和嗅觉的感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 岩地伪装
entries: 你在岩石地形为躲藏所进行的敏捷（{@skill 隐匿}）检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写地底通用语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 格龙蛙人在一岁时成年，且已知可以活到最多50岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的格龙蛙人都是守序阵营，并在严格的种姓制度下长大。而由于他们那鲜少发生社会阶级流动的文化，他们也通常是邪恶的。他们的社会阶级流动大部分会发生在军队中，当某个种姓的成员死亡，且没有其他成员能够填补该空缺的时候。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 格龙蛙人的身高介于2.5尺到3.5尺之间，且平均约30磅重。你的体型为小型。

entries.name: 树栖警觉
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 察觉}技能。

entries.name: 两栖
entries: 你可以在空气和水中呼吸。

entries.name: 毒素免疫
entries: 你免疫于毒素伤害和{@condition 中毒}状态。

entries.name: 剧毒皮肤
entries: 任何擒抱你、或通过任何其他方式直接碰触到你皮肤的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 12的体质豁免，否则将陷入{@condition 中毒}状态长达1分钟。不再直接碰触你皮肤的{@condition 中毒}生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复进行这个豁免检定，豁免成功则结束这个效果对它的影响。
你也可以在使用任何穿刺武器进行攻击时，做为其攻击的一部份使用这个毒素，但这个毒素的效果将会因此产生变化。目标必须成功通过一次DC 12的体质豁免，否则将受到{@dice 2d4}的毒素伤害。

entries.name: 立定跳跃
entries: 你的跳远距离最多25尺、且跳高距离最多15尺，无论有没有助跑都一样。

entries.name: 依赖水源
entries: 若你在一天内没有将自己浸泡在水中至少1小时，你将在该日结束时承受一级{@condition 力竭}。你只能通过魔法或将你自己浸泡在水中至少1小时的方式来解除这个{@condition 力竭}状态。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写格龙蛙人语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 半精灵的成熟速度和人类相同，并在20岁左右成年。然而，他们的寿命远长于人类，经常能活超过180岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 半精灵分享了来自他们精灵血统的混乱天性。他们重视个人自由和创造性表达，既不展现出对领导者的喜爱、也不渴望受人追随。他们厌恶规则、讨厌被别人命令、且有时会显得不太可靠——或至少难以预测。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 半精灵有着和人类相近的体型，身高介于5尺至6尺之间。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 多亏于你的精灵血统，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 精类血统
entries: 你在对抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免检定中具有优势，且魔法无法让你入睡。

entries.name: 多才多艺
entries: 你熟练于二个你所选择的技能。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语、精灵语、和另一种你所选择的语言。

entries.name: Age
entries: Half-elves mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live much longer than humans, however, often exceeding 180 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Half-elves share the chaotic bent of their elven heritage. They value both personal freedom and creative expression, demonstrating neither love of leaders nor desire for followers. They chafe at rules, resent others' demands, and sometimes prove unreliable, or at least unpredictable.

entries.name: Size
entries: Half-elves are about the same size as humans, ranging from 5 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your elf blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition 魅惑}, and magic can't put you to sleep.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Elvish, and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill.

entries.name: Swim
entries: You gain a swimming speed of 30 ft.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill.

entries.name: Drow Magic
entries: You know the {@spell 舞光术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 妖火术} spell once per day; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. When you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell 黑暗术} spell once per day; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Deductive Intuition
entries: When you make an Intelligence ({@skill 调查}) or a Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Magical Detection
entries: You can cast the {@spell 侦测魔法} and {@spell 侦测毒素或疾病} spells with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the {@spell 识破隐形} spell with it. Once you cast any of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells, and you don't require material components for them.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Detection Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Detection Spells
rows: {@spell 侦测善恶}, {@spell 侦测毒素或疾病}
{@spell 侦测思想}, {@spell 寻找陷阱}

entries.name: Windwright's Intuition
entries: When you make a Dexterity ({@skill 体操}) check or any ability check involving {@item 领航工具|PHB}, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Storm's Boon
entries: You have resistance to lightning damage.

entries.name: Headwinds
entries: You know the {@spell gust|XGE} cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 造风术} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Storm Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Storm Spells
rows: {@spell 召唤次级元素生物}, {@spell 操控水体}

subraces.name: 月精灵或日精灵血统
subraces.ENG_name: Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard|level=0}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: You gain proficiency in two skills of your choice.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill.

entries.name: Elf Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb}, and {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 半兽人的成熟速度比人类略快一些，并在14岁左右便成年。他们的衰老速度明显更快，且很少能活超过75岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 半兽人从他们的兽人亲代继承了容易倾向于混乱的血统，且因此不会有善良阵营的强烈倾向。在兽人中成长并愿意在其中生活的半兽人通常是邪恶的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 半兽人比人类更大而魁梧，他们的身高范围从不到5尺到远超过6尺都有。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 多亏于你的兽人血统，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 凶恶
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 威吓}技能。

entries.name: 顽强耐性
entries: 当你的生命值被归零但没有当场被杀死时，你可以改为使生命值减少至1。直到完成一次长休之前，你都不能再使用这个特性。

entries.name: 野蛮攻击
entries: 当你以一次近战武器攻击造成重击时，你可以额外骰一次该武器的其中一颗伤害骰，并将之加入重击的额外伤害中。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和兽人语。兽人语是一种使用硬辅音的粗糙、刺耳的语言。它没有自己的文本，而是使用矮人文本进行书写。

entries.name: Age
entries: Half-orcs mature a little faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14. They age noticeably faster and rarely live longer than 75 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Half-orcs inherit a tendency toward chaos from their orc parents and are not strongly inclined toward good. Half-orcs raised among orcs and willing to live out their lives among them are usually evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Half-orcs are somewhat larger and bulkier than humans, and they range from 5 to well over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Hunter's Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) or Wisdom ({@skill 生存}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Finder's Magic
entries: You can cast the {@spell 猎人印记} spell with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the {@spell 物品定位术} spell with it. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Finding Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Finding Spells
rows: {@spell 动植物定位术}, {@spell 物品定位术}
{@spell 锐眼术}, {@spell 植物交谈术}
{@spell 预言术}, {@spell 生物定位术}

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 半身人在20岁时成年，且通常可以活到150岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的半身人都是守序善良。一般来说，他们心地善良、和蔼可亲，厌恶看见他人受苦，且完全不能容忍压迫。他们也很守秩序、助重传统、无比倚重他们社群的支持以及老套生活所带来的舒适。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 半身人平均大约3尺高，且体重约莫40磅。你的体型为小型。

entries.name: 幸运
entries: 当你在攻击检定、属性检定、或豁免检定中骰出了1，你可以重骰该检定且必须使用新的掷骰结果。

entries.name: 勇敢
entries: 你在对抗{@condition 恐惧}的豁免检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 半身人灵巧
entries: 你可以移动穿过任何体型大于你的生物所在的空间。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和半身人语。半身人的语言并不是秘密，但他们并不怎么情愿与他人分享它。他们很少书写，因此并没有丰富的文学作品。然而，他们的口说传统相当强势。几乎所有半身人都会说通用语，以跟他所居住或旅经地区的人们交谈。

entries.name: Silent Speech
entries: You can speak telepathically to any creature within 30 feet of you. The creature understands you only if the two of you share a language. You can speak telepathically in this way to one creature at a time.

entries.name: Naturally Stealthy
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

entries.name: Child of the Wood
entries: You know the {@spell 德鲁伊伎俩} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 纠缠术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 荆棘丛生} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Casting these spells with this trait doesn't require material components. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Timberwalk
entries: Ability checks made to track you have disadvantage, and you can move across difficult terrain made of nonmagical plants and undergrowth without expending extra movement.

entries.name: Medical Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill 医疗}) check or an ability check using an {@item 草药工具|phb}, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Healing Touch
entries: You can cast the {@spell 治疗伤势} spell with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast {@spell 次级复原术} with it. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Healing Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Healing Spells
rows: {@spell 治疗伤势}, {@spell 治愈真言}
{@spell 次级复原术}, {@spell 治愈祈祷}
{@spell 活力灵光}, {@spell 群体治愈真言}
{@spell 净化灵光}, {@spell 生命灵光}

entries.name: Ever Hospitable
entries: When you make a Charisma ({@skill 说服}) check or an ability check involving {@item 酿酒工具|PHB} or {@item 厨师工具|PHB}, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Innkeeper's Magic
entries: You know the {@spell 魔法技俩} cantrip. You can also cast the {@spell 净化饮食} and {@spell 隐形仆役} spells with this trait. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Hospitality Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Hospitality Spells
rows: {@spell 创造饮食}, {@spell 李欧蒙小屋}
{@spell 净化灵光}, {@spell 魔邓肯私人密室}

entries.name: Stout Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

items.name: Type:
items.entry: Fey and Humanoid

items.name: Size:
items.entry: Medium or Small (choose when you gain this lineage)

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.

entries.name: Fey Resilience
entries: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition 魅惑} condition on yourself.

entries.name: Hex Magic
entries: You can cast the {@spell 易容术} and {@spell 脆弱诅咒} spells with this trait. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose when you gain this lineage). Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using any spells slots you have.

entries.name: Magic Token
entries: As an action, you can harmlessly pull out one of your nails, a tooth, or a lock of hair. This token is imbued with magic until you finish a long rest. While the token is imbued in this way, you can use an action to send a telepathic message to the creature holding or carrying the token, as long as you are on the same plane of existence and are within 10 miles of it. The message can contain up to twenty-five words.

In addition, while you are within 10 miles of the token, you can use an action to enter a trance for 1 minute, during which you can see and hear from the token as if you were located where it is. While you are using your senses at the token's location, you are {@condition 目盲} and {@condition 耳聋} in regard to your own surroundings. Afterward, the token is harmlessly destroyed.
Once you create a token using this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest, at which point your missing part regrows.

entries.name: 成军优势
entries: 每回合一次，当你以一次武器攻击命中一个生物时，若你有一个盟友距离该生物5尺内且该盟友并未{@condition 无力}，则你可以对它造成额外的{@dice 2d6}伤害。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和地精语。

items.name: Alignment
