entries: Hobgoblin society in Eberron is shaped by the ideal of a strict code of honor and rigid martial discipline. Most hobgoblins are lawful, tending toward harsh enforcement of their laws.

items.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: You are a Humanoid.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition 魅惑} condition on yourself.

entries.name: Fey Gift
entries: You can use this trait to take the {@action 协助} action as a bonus action, and you can do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Starting at 3rd level, choose one of the options below each time you take the {@action 协助} action, whether as a bonus action or an action:

items.name: Hospitality.
items.entry: You and the target of your {@action 协助} action each gain a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} plus your proficiency bonus.

items.name: Passage.
items.entry: You and the target of your {@action 协助} action each increase your walking speeds by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Spite.
items.entry: Until the start of your next turn, the first time you or the target of your {@action 协助} action hits a creature with an attack roll, that creature has disadvantage on the next attack roll that it makes within the next minute.

entries.name: Fortune from the Many
entries: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can draw on your bonds of reciprocity to gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses you finish a long rest.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 大地精的成熟速度和人类相同，且有着与他们相似的寿命长度。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大地精的社会是创建在对严格无情的行为准则的忠诚之上。也如此，他们往往倾向于守序邪恶。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 大地精的身高介于5到6尺之间，且体重介于150到200磅。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 军事训练
entries: 你熟练于二种你所选择的{@filter 军用武器|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon}和轻甲。

entries.name: 挽回颜面
entries: 大地精由于惧怕失去地位，因此他们相当谨慎于不在盟友面前暴露软弱。若你在一次攻击检定中失手，或在一次属性检定或豁免检定中失败，你可以让该检定获得等同于距离你30尺内盟友数量的加值（最大加值+5）。一旦你使用此特性，直到你完成一次短休或长休之前你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和地精语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 人类在近二十岁时成年，且可活不到一世纪。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 人类并不倾向特定阵营。你可以在他们之中找到最好以及最坏的个体。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 人类身高体格之间的差距很大，从勉强5尺高到远超过6尺都有。不论你在这范围内的位置为何，你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和另一种你所选择的语言。人类通常会学习那些与他们打交道的其他族类的语言，包括那些晦涩难解的方言。他们喜欢借用来自其他方言的字词去点缀他们的言词，像是兽人的咒骂、精灵音乐般的措辞、矮人的军事词组、诸如此类。

entries.name: Age
entries: Keldons reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Keldons tend toward chaotic alignments, and many walk a fine line between good and evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Keldons are taller and heavier than the human norms of other cultures, standing almost universally above 6 feet tall and reaching heights above 7 feet. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Keldon.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 运动} skill.

entries.name: Keldon Resilience
entries: You have proficiency in Strength saving throws.

entries.name: Icehaven Born
entries: You are naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in chapter 5 of the {@i Dungeon Master's Guide}.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Hunter's Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) or Wisdom ({@skill 生存}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Finder's Magic
entries: You can cast the {@spell 猎人印记} spell with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the {@spell 物品定位术} spell with it. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Goblin.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Finding Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Finding Spells
rows: {@spell 动植物定位术}, {@spell 物品定位术}
{@spell 锐眼术}, {@spell 植物交谈术}
{@spell 预言术}, {@spell 生物定位术}

entries.name: Wild Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill 驯兽}) or Intelligence ({@skill 自然}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Primal Connection
entries: You can cast the {@spell 化兽为友} and {@spell 动物交谈术} spells with this trait, requiring no material component. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a short or long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: The Bigger They Are
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can target a beast or monstrosity when you cast {@spell 化兽为友} or {@spell 动物交谈术}, provided the creature's Intelligence score is 3 or lower.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Handling Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Handling Spells
rows: {@spell 化兽为友}, {@spell 动物交谈术}
{@spell 野兽知觉}, {@spell 安定心神}
{@spell 希望信标}, {@spell 召唤动物}
{@spell 生命灵光}, {@spell 支配野兽}

entries.name: Artisan's Intuition
entries: When you make an {@skill 奥秘} check or an ability check involving artisan's tools, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Maker's Gift
entries: You gain proficiency with one type of artisan's tools of your choice.

entries.name: Spellsmith
entries: You know the {@spell 修复术} cantrip. You can also cast the {@spell 魔化武器} spell with this trait. When you do so, the spell lasts for 1 hour and doesn't require concentration. Once you cast the spell with this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Making Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Making Spells
rows: {@spell 鉴定术}, {@spell 谭森浮碟术}
{@spell 不灭明焰}, {@spell 魔化武器}
{@spell 召唤箭幕}, {@spell 元素武器}

entries.name: Courier's Speed
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 35 feet.

entries.name: Intuitive Motion
entries: When you make a Dexterity ({@skill 体操}) check or any ability check to operate or maintain a land vehicle, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Magical Passage
entries: You can cast the {@spell 迷踪步} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a long rest. Dexterity is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Passage Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Passage Spells
rows: {@spell 次元门}, {@spell 行动自如术}

entries.name: Sentinel's Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill 洞悉}) or Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Guardian's Shield
entries: You can cast the {@spell 护盾术} spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it after you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

entries.name: Vigilant Guardian
entries: When a creature you can see within 5 feet of you is hit by an attack roll, you can use your reaction to swap places with that creature, and you are hit by the attack instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Sentinel Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Sentinel Spells
rows: {@spell 强迫决斗}, {@spell 虔诚护盾}
{@spell 守护联结}, {@spell 诚实之域}
{@spell 反制法术}, {@spell 防护能量}
{@spell 防死护咒}, {@spell 虔诚守卫}

entries.name: Skills
entries: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

entries.name: Feat
entries: You gain one {@5etools feat|feats.html} of your choice.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 人类在近二十岁时成年。大部分的人类祀徒会在他们30岁之前完成祀炼，并在那之前迎接光荣或不光彩的死亡。首席大臣可以享有更多的时间以服侍他们的神明，且理论上可以活到最多一个世纪。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 人类并不倾向特定阵营。你可以在他们之中找到最好以及最坏的个体。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 人类身高体格之间的差距很大，从勉强5尺高到远超过6尺都有。不论你在这范围内的位置为何，你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 技能
entries: 你熟练于一个你所选择的技能。

entries.name: 专长
entries: 你获得一个你所选择的{@5etools 专长|feats.html}。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和另一种你所选择的语言。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 人类在近二十岁时成年，且可活不到一世纪。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 人类并不倾向特定阵营。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 人类身高体格之间的差距很大，从勉强5尺高到远超过6尺都有。不论你在这范围内的位置为何，你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和另一种你所选择的语言。

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Your ability scores each increase by 1.

entries.name: Forest Folk
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 生存} skill.

entries.name: Fleet of Foot
entries: Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

entries.name: Sure-footed
entries: When you use the {@action 疾走} action, difficult terrain doesn't cost you extra movement on that turn.

entries.name: Spring Attack
entries: When you make a melee attack against a creature, you don't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of your turn, whether you hit or not.

entries.name: Breadth of Knowledge
entries: You gain proficiency in any combination of four skills or with four {@book tools|phb|5|tools} of your choice.

entries.name: Daunting
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 威吓} skill.

entries.name: Tough
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by 2, and it increases by 2 every time you gain a level.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Or, if your campaign uses the optional rules for languages found in the previous section, your national origin determines your native language: Itzocan for the Sun Empire, Coalition pidgin for the Brazen Coalition, or Vampire for the Legion of Dusk. You still speak one additional language of your choice, and Common if it exists in your campaign.

items.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Humans typically learn the languages of other peoples they deal with, including obscure dialects. They are fond of sprinkling their speech with words borrowed from other tongues: vampire curses, Elvish musical expressions, merfolk scholarly jargon, and so on.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kalashtar mature and age at the same rate as humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The noble spirit tied to a kalashtar drives it toward lawful and good behavior. Most kalashtar combine strong self-discipline with compassion for all beings, but some kalashtar resist the virtuous influence of their spirit.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Dual Mind
entries: You have advantage on all Wisdom saving throws.

entries.name: Mental Discipline
entries: You have resistance to psychic damage.

entries.name: Mind Link
entries: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see, provided the creature is within a number of feet of you equal to 10 times your level. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathic utterances, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language.

When you're using this trait to speak telepathically to a creature, you can use your action to give that creature the ability to speak telepathically with you for 1 hour or until you end this effect as an action. To use this ability, the creature must be able to see you and must be within this trait's range. You can give this ability to only one creature at a time; giving it to a creature takes it away from another creature who has it.

entries.name: Severed from Dreams
entries: Kalashtar sleep, but they don't connect to the plane of dreams as other creatures do. Instead, their minds draw from the memories of their otherworldly spirit while they sleep. As such, you are immune to spells and other magical effects that require you to dream, like {@spell 托梦术}, but not to spells and other magical effects that put you to sleep, like {@spell 睡眠术}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori, and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kalashtar develop physically at the same rate as humans do and have similar lifespans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The noble spirit tied to a kalashtar drives it toward lawful and good behavior. Most kalashtar combine self-discipline with compassion for all sentient beings, but some kalashtar resist the virtuous influence of their spirit.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kalashtar are similar in build to humans, though they are typically a few inches taller. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Dual Mind
entries: When you make a Wisdom saving throw, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the roll. You can use this trait immediately before or after you roll, but before any of the roll's effects occur.

entries.name: Mental Discipline
entries: You have resistance to psychic damage.

entries.name: Mind Link
entries: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see within 60 feet of you. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathic messages, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language or be telepathic itself.

As a bonus action when you're speaking telepathically to a creature, you can give that creature the ability to speak telepathically to you until the start of your next turn. To use this ability, the creature must be within 60 feet of you and able to see you.

entries.name: Psychic Glamour
entries: Choose one of the following skills: {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 威吓}, {@skill 表演}, or {@skill 说服}. You have advantage on all ability checks you make with that skill.

entries.name: Severed from Dreams
entries: Kalashtar sleep, but they don't connect to the plane of dreams as other creatures do. Instead, their minds draw from the memories of their otherworldly spirit while they sleep. As such, you are immune to spells and other magical effects that require you to dream, like the dream spell, but not to spells and effects that put you to sleep, like the sleep spell.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori, and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: 伏击者
entries: 在战斗的第一轮中，你对任何被突袭的生物所进行的攻击检定具有优势。

entries.name: 拟声
entries: 你可以模仿任何你曾听过的声音，包括人的嗓音。一个听到这类声音的生物可以通过成功通过一次感知（{@skill 洞悉}）检定来对抗你的魅力（{@skill 欺瞒}）检定以辨别出它是被模仿发出的。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和气族语，但你只能使用你的拟声特性来说话。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 天狗有着比人类更短的寿命。他们在12岁左右成年，且可以活到60岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 天狗是混乱的生物，他们很少做出长久的承诺，且他们最关心的是保护自己的藏身处。他们的观点通常会是混乱中立。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 天狗的身高大约为5尺高，且体重介于90到120磅之间。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 专业伪造
entries: 你可以拷贝其他生物的笔迹和手艺。你在用于伪造文书或拷贝既存物体所进行的所有检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 天狗训练
entries: 你熟练于下列二个你所选择的技能：{@skill 体操}、{@skill 欺瞒}、{@skill 隐匿}、和{@skill 巧手}。

entries.name: 拟声
entries: 你可以模仿任何你曾听过的声音，包括人的嗓音。一个听到这类声音的生物可以通过成功通过一次感知（{@skill 洞悉}）检定来对抗你的魅力（{@skill 欺瞒}）检定以辨别出它是被模仿发出的。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和气族语，但你只能使用你的拟声特性来说话。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 胡狼人成熟速度很快，在十几岁便成年。胡狼人祀徒通常会是同辈中最年轻的一群，并会在他们近二十岁时完成祀炼。即使没有因暴力而死亡，他们也很少活过60岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的胡狼人倾向混乱阵营。他们并不特别倾向善良或邪恶。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 胡狼人有着和人类相似的身形。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 胡狼人武器训练
entries: 你熟练于埃及镰状剑({@item 长剑|phb})、{@item 矛|phb}、和{@item 标枪|phb}。

entries.name: 胡狼人双子
entries: 若你的双胞胎仍活着，且你可以看见你的双胞胎，则每当你在一次攻击检定、属性检定、或豁免检定中骰出1时，你都可以重掷该骰且必须使用新的掷骰结果。若你的双胞胎已经死亡（或若你出生时并没有双胞胎），则你将不会被{@condition 恐惧}。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和胡狼人语。

entries.name: 群体战术
entries: 若你有至少一个盟友距离目标生物5尺内且该盟友并未{@condition 无力}，则你在对该生物进行的攻击检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 当你、你的攻击目标、或你尝试感知的东西直接暴露在阳光下，则你依赖于视觉的攻击检定以及感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定具有劣势。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和龙语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 狗头人在6岁时成年，并可以活到最多120岁，但这相当罕见。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 狗头人本质上是自私的，这也使他们偏向邪恶，但他们对于团体力量的依赖则使他们偏向守序。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 狗头人的身高介于2到3尺，且体重介于25到35磅。你的体型为小型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 摇尾乞怜
entries: 在你的回合以一个动作，你可以可怜兮兮地蜷缩以分散附近敌人的注意。直到你下个回合结束前，你的盟友在对距离你10尺内且你能看见的敌人所进行的攻击检定中具有优势。一旦你使用这个特性，直到你完成一次短休或长休之前你都无法再使用它。

entries.name: 群体战术
entries: 若你有至少一个盟友距离目标生物5尺内且该盟友并未{@condition 无力}，则你在对该生物进行的攻击检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 当你、你的攻击目标、或你尝试感知的东西直接暴露在阳光下，则你依赖于视觉的攻击检定以及感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定具有劣势。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和龙语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Kor mature at the same rate as humans and live about as long.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most kor are lawful good, with a strong dedication to community and the traditions of their ancestors.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kor average nearly 6 feet tall, but are much lighter and more slender than humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition 恐惧}.

entries.name: Climbing
entries: You also have a climbing speed of 30 feet as long as you are not encumbered or wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Kor Climbing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 运动} and {@skill 体操} skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, and communicate in the silent speech of the Kor.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: 两栖
entries: 你可以在空气和水中呼吸。

entries.name: 异界感知
entries: 你可以感知到任何距离你30尺内处于{@condition 隐形}状态或在乙太位面的生物。你可以准确知道这类生物在移动时的确切位置。

entries.name: 滑溜
entries: 你在为逃离擒抱所进行的属性检定和豁免检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 当处于日光照耀下时，你在攻击检定，以及依赖视觉的感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定中具有劣势。

entries.name: 高级黑暗视觉
entries: 你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你120尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写地底通用语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Leonin mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Leonin tend toward good alignments. Leonin who are focused on the pride lean toward lawful good.

entries.name: Size
entries: Leonin are typically over 6 feet tall, with some standing over 7 feet. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Claws
entries: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you can deal slashing damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Hunter's Instincts
entries: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill 运动}, {@skill 威吓}, {@skill 察觉}, or {@skill 生存}.

entries.name: Daunting Roar
entries: As a bonus action, you can let out an especially menacing roar. Creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you that can hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition 恐惧} of you until the end of your next turn. The DC of the save equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Leonin.

entries.name: 屏息
entries: 你可以屏住你的呼吸长达15分钟。

entries.name: 天生护甲
entries: 你的鳞片做为天生护甲发挥作用，让你的护甲等级获得+3加值。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写龙语。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 蜥蜴人在大约14岁时成年，且很少活超过60年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分蜥蜴人是中立的。他们认为这世界上只存在狩猎者和猎物，在这里生与死都只不过是自然的过程。他们的愿望只有生存，和偏好让其他的生物自生自灭。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 蜥蜴人比人类略为魁梧而高大，且他们身上色彩缤纷的装饰会让他们显得更大一些。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 游泳速度
entries: 你拥有30尺的游泳速度。

entries.name: 啃咬
entries: 你长满獠牙的血盆大口是一种天生武器，且你可以用它来进行徒手打击。如果你以它命中目标，则你造成等同1d6 + 你的力量调整值的穿刺伤害，而非一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 能巧工匠
entries: 做为短休的一部分，你可以利用从被杀死的小型或更大的野兽、构装体、龙、怪兽，或植物身上采集下来的骨头和兽皮制作下列其中一个物品：一面{@item 盾牌|phb}、一根{@item 棍棒|phb}、一把{@item 标枪|phb}或{@dice 1d4}个{@item 飞镖|phb}或{@item 吹箭|phb}。若要使用这个特性，你将需要一把刀刃，像是一把{@item 匕首|phb}或是其他适合的工匠工具，例如{@item 皮匠工具|phb}。

entries.name: 屏息
entries: 你可以屏住你的呼吸长达15分钟。

entries.name: 猎人学识
entries: 你熟练于下列二种你所选择的技能：{@skill 驯兽}、{@skill 自然}、{@skill 察觉}、{@skill 隐匿}、和{@skill 生存}。

entries.name: 天生护甲
entries: 你拥有坚硬、带鳞的皮肤。当你未穿戴护甲时，你的AC为13 + 你的敏捷调整值。如果你穿着的护甲会让你有较低的AC，则你可以使用你的天生护甲来计算你的AC。当你使用天生护甲时，盾牌的加值仍会如常作用。

entries.name: 饥渴之腭
entries: 在战斗中，你可以让你自己陷入一种凶猛的暴食狂热。以一个附赠动作，你可以使用你的啃咬进行一次特殊攻击。若该攻击命中，则它将造成它原本的伤害，且你获得等同于你体质调整值（最低为1）的临时生命值，且直到你完成一次短休或长休之前你都不能再使用此特性。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和龙语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Locathah mature to adulthood by the age of 10 but have been known to live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most locathah are true neutral or have some aspect of neutrality in their alignment. They tend toward good, coming from a culture where compassion for the downtrodden is a commonality.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Observant & Athletic
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 运动} and {@skill 察觉} skills.

entries.name: Leviathan Will
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition 魅惑}, {@condition 恐惧}, {@condition 麻痹}, {@condition 中毒}, {@condition 震慑}, or put to sleep.

entries.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: You can breathe air and water, but you need to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

entries.name: Size
entries: Locathah stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan and Common.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 象族生理成年的速度与人类相同，但他们的寿命可达大约450岁。他们非常重视智能与经验的重要性，且在达到60岁之前都被视为年轻人。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大多数的象族都是守序的，相信着和平与秩序生活的价值。他们也倾向善良。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 象族的身高介于7尺至8尺之间。他们庞大身躯的重量则介于300至400磅之间。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 强健体格
entries: 当决定你的负重以及你可以拖曳、推动、或提举的重量时，你将你的体型视作比原本大一级。

entries.name: 象族沉着
entries: 你在对抗{@condition 魅惑}或{@condition 恐惧}的豁免检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 天生护甲
entries: 你有着厚实、皮革般的肌肤。当你未穿着护甲的时候，你的AC为12 + 你的体质调整值。如果你穿着的护甲会让你有较低的AC，则你可以使用你的天生护甲来计算你的AC。当你使用天生护甲时，盾牌的加值仍会如常作用。

entries.name: 提示：AC的计算方法并不会累积
entries: 当游戏机制给了你多于一种计算护甲等级的方式，你只能使用其中一种方式。由你选择要使用哪一种。举例来说，如果你同时拥有象族的天生护甲和武僧的无甲防御，你不能把它们混在一起使用。你只能选择其中一种方式来计算你的AC。

entries.name: 象鼻
entries: 你可以用你的象鼻抓取物品，你也可以把它作为呼吸管使用。它有着5尺触及范围，且它可以擡起等同你力量属性值五倍的磅数。你可以用它做出以下的简单作业：擡起、丢下、持握、推动或是拖动一个物体或生物；打开或关上一扇门或容器；擒抱某人；或进行一次徒手打击。你的DM可能会允许你将其他的简单作业加到上面的选项列表中。
你的象鼻不能使用武器、盾牌、或其他需要精细操作的东西，像是使用工具或魔法物品、或运行一个法术的姿势构材。

entries.name: 敏锐嗅觉
entries: 多亏了你那敏锐的象鼻，你在牵涉到嗅觉的感知({@skill 察觉})、感知({@skill 生存})、和智力({@skill 调查})检定上具有优势。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和象族语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Loxodons physically mature at the same rate as humans, but they live about 450 years. They highly value the weight of wisdom and experience and are considered young until they reach the age of 60.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most loxodons are lawful, believing in the value of a peaceful, ordered life. They also tend toward good.

entries.name: Size
entries: Loxodons stand between 7 and 8 feet tall. Their massive bodies weigh between 300 and 400 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Loxodon Bravery
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition 恐惧}.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have thick, leathery skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Tip: AC Calculations Don't Stack
entries: When the game gives you more than one way to calculate your Armor Class, you can use only one of them. You choose the one to use. For example, if you have the loxodon's Natural Armor trait and the monk's Unarmored Defense feature, you don't mix them together. Instead, you choose which one determines your AC.

entries.name: Mason's Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency with {@item 泥瓦匠工具|phb}.

entries.name: Stonecunning
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill 历史}) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the {@skill 历史} skill and add double your normal proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries: Thanks to your sensitive trunk, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill 察觉}) and Intelligence ({@skill 调查}) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: 两栖
entries: 你可以在空气和水中呼吸。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和水族语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most merfolk are neutral, living in close harmony with nature.

entries.name: Size
entries: Merfolk are significantly taller than most humans, standing between seven and eight feet tall and averaging about 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common (if it exists in your campaign), Merfolk, and one additional language of your choice.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Lore of the Waters
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 历史} and {@skill 自然} skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|class=Druid|level=0}. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

entries.name: Age
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most merfolk are neutral, though merfolk of the Emeria and Cosi creeds have chaotic leanings.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water.

entries.name: Size
entries: Merfolk are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Merfolk, and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter bard spell list|spells|class=bard|level=0}. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Creed of the Trickster
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 巧手} and {@skill 隐匿} skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter druid spell list|spells|class=druid|level=0}. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Wind Creed Manipulation
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 欺瞒} and {@skill 说服} skills.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You know one cantrip of your choice from the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard|level=0}. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Water Creed Navigation
entries: You have proficiency with {@item 领航工具|phb} and in the {@skill 生存} skill.
{@note 这些特性也同样适用于在那些其他D&D世界中，没有受到巴风特恶魔力量影响的米诺陶们。}
{@note 由于魔法风云会的官方译名将Minotaur译为牛头怪，因此以下内容都将以牛头怪称呼之。}

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 牛头怪在17岁左右成年，且有最多150年的寿命。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分加入波洛斯的牛头人倾向守序阵营，而那些与拉铎司和古鲁有关的牛头人则倾向混乱阵营。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 牛头怪的平均身高超过6尺，且他们有着健壮的身材。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 牛角
entries: 你的牛角是天生近战武器，你可以使用它们来进行徒手打击。如果你以它们命中目标，则你造成等同1d6 + 你的力量调整值的穿刺伤害，而不是一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 牛角冲刺
entries: 紧接在你于你的回合使用{@action 疾走}动作并移动至少20尺后，你可以立刻以一个附赠动作使用你的牛角进行一次近战攻击。

entries.name: 猛捶角击
entries: 紧接在你于你的回合以{@action 攻击}动作的一部分，通过一次近战攻击命中一个生物后，你可以立刻以一个附赠动作尝试使用你的牛角去推撞该目标。目标的体型不能比你大超过一级，且必须距离你5尺以内。除非它成功通过DC等同于8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的力量调整值的力量豁免，否则你将把它推离你最多10尺。

entries.name: 威风凛凛
entries: 你熟练于以下其中一个你所选择的技能：{@skill 威吓}或{@skill 说服}。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和牛头语。

items.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs who leave the walls of Skophos have the opportunity to be free of its culture and pursue chaotic alignments, while those who remain within the polis and its tyrannical regime tend toward lawful alignments.

{@note In 2015, minotaurs appeared as a playtest option in Unearthed Arcana. Here is a revised set of traits for minotaur player characters. These traits are suitable for minotaurs on Krynn and in other D&D worlds where these people have avoided the demonic influence of Baphomet.}

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most minotaurs lean toward lawful alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs average over 6 feet in height, and they have strong, stocky builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Horns
entries: Your horns are natural melee weapons, with which you're proficient. When you hit with them, the target takes piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: Immediately after you use the {@action 疾走} action on your turn and move at least as far as your speed, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as part of the {@action 攻击} action on your turn, you can attempt to shove that creature with your horns using your reaction. The creature must be no more than one size larger than you and within 5 feet of you. It must make a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier. If it fails, you push it up to 5 feet away from you.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 威吓} skill.

entries.name: Hybrid Nature
entries: You have two creature types: humanoid and monstrosity. You can be affected by a game effect if it works on either of your creature types.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Minotaur.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 牛头人的发育比人类缓慢，在20岁左右才会完全成熟。他们通常会在8到9岁时做为侍僧，加入他们同侪间较年长的成员。然而，一旦他们成年，牛头人将会迅速的衰老。他们也会因此积极投入祀炼之旅（他们在生命中其他方面的表现也是如此），以在他们从巅峰衰弱之前完成祀炼。能够死于高龄的牛头怪也鲜少活超过40岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的牛头人倾向混乱阵营，且他们有着些微朝向邪恶的倾向。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 牛头怪的平均身高超过6尺，且他们有着健壮的身材。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 天生武器
entries: 你可以使用你的双角做为天生武器来进行徒手打击。如果你以它们命中目标，则你造成等同1d6 + 你的力量调整值的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 凶恶
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 威吓}技能。

entries.name: 顽强耐性
entries: 当你的生命值被归零但没有当场被杀死时，你可以改为使生命值减少至1。直到完成一次长休之前，你都不能再使用这个特性。

entries.name: 野蛮攻击
entries: 当你以一次近战武器攻击造成重击时，你可以额外骰一次该武器的其中一颗伤害骰，并将之加入重击的额外伤害中。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和牛头语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs believe in a strict code of honor, and thus tend toward law. They are loyal to the death and make implacable enemies, even as their brutal culture and disdain for weakness push them toward evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs typically stand well over 6 feet tall and weigh an average of 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Conqueror's Virtue
entries: From a young age, you focused on one of the three virtues of strength, cunning, or intellect. Your choice of your Strength, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are never unarmed. You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals {@dice 1d10} piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: When you use the {@action 疾走} action during your turn, you can make a melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: When you use the {@action 攻击} action during your turn to make a melee attack, you can attempt to shove a creature with your horns as a bonus action. You cannot use this shove attempt to knock a creature {@condition 伏地}.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: You can perfectly recall any path you have traveled.

entries.name: Sea Reaver
entries: You gain proficiency with {@item 领航工具|phb} and {@filter vehicles (water)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (water)}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 与人类相似，纳迦在近二十岁时成年。他们在长到一定年纪后，除了越长越大之外便不会再有其他衰老的迹象，因此理论上，一名纳迦可以活到超过一个世纪。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分纳迦的阵营属于绝对中立或中立邪恶。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 纳迦在直立时约莫5尺高，但他们身体从头到尾的总长可以从10尺到20尺不等。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 瞬间加速
entries: 通过将你的身体压低在地，并用双手推动自己，你可以在一段时间内移动得比平常更快。在你的回合以一个附赠动作，若你有两只空手，则你可以使你的步行速度增加5尺，持续直到你的回合结束。

entries.name: 天生武器
entries: 你的尖牙和绞缠的蛇形身体都是天生武器，且你可以用它们来进行徒手打击。
如果你使用啃咬攻击并命中目标，则你造成等同1d4 + 你的力量调整值的穿刺伤害，且你的目标必须进行一次体质豁免（DC为 8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的体质调整值）。若豁免失败，目标将受到1d4毒素伤害。
如果你使用绞缠攻击并命中目标，则你造成等同1d6 + 你的力量调整值的钝击伤害，且目标{@condition 被擒}（逃脱DC为 8 + 你的熟练加值 + 你的力量调整值）。直到擒抱结束前，目标被{@condition 束缚}，且你不能绞缠另一个目标。

entries.name: 毒素免疫
entries: 你免疫于毒素伤害和{@condition 中毒}状态。

entries.name: 毒素亲合
entries: 你熟练于{@item 制毒工具|phb}。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和纳迦语。

entries.name: 侵略性
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以向一个你所能看见的敌意生物移动最多等同你移动速度的距离。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和兽人语。

items.name: Age
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 16, and live up to 80 years.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Orcs fear the curse of ruin that is said to plague their race, and tend strongly toward either chaos (accepting their fate), or toward law (rejecting it).

items.name: Size
entries: Orcs stand easily 8 feet tall and corded with powerful muscles, weighing up to 280 pounds. Your size is Medium.

items.name: Primal Intuition
entries: You have proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill 驯兽}, {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 威吓}, {@skill 医疗}, {@skill 察觉}, and {@skill 生存}.

entries.name: Age
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The orcs of Eberron are a passionate people, given to powerful emotion and deep faith. They are generally chaotic, but can be any alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

entries.name: Primal Intuition
entries: You have proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill 驯兽}, {@skill 洞悉}, {@skill 威吓}, {@skill 医疗}, {@skill 自然}, {@skill 察觉}, and {@skill 生存}.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 兽人在12岁时成年，并可以活到最多50岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 兽人是恶毒的掠夺者，他们相信这个世界应该属于他们。他们崇敬力量高于一切，并相信强者必须欺凌弱者以确保软弱不会像疾病一样传播。他们通常是混乱邪恶。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 兽人通常超过6尺高，且体重介于230到280磅之间。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。 你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 侵略性
entries: 以一个附赠动作，你可以向一个你所能看见或听见的敌意生物移动最多等同你移动速度的距离。你必须在比你开始移动时距离该敌人更近的位置结束此移动。

entries.name: 凶恶
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 威吓}技能。

entries.name: 强健体格
entries: 当决定你的负重以及你可以拖曳、推动、或提举的重量时，你将你的体型视作比原本大一级。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和兽人语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Orcs mature a little faster than humans, reaching adulthood around age 14. They age noticeably faster and rarely live longer than 75 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most orcs lean toward chaotic alignments, and many serve on pirate ships that encourage an inclination toward evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Orcs average over 6 feet in height, and they have strong, stocky builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill Intimidation} skill.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Savage Attacks
entries: When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common (if it exists in your campaign) and Orc.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: You are a Humanoid.

entries.name: Size
entries: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you gain this race.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 90 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Magic Sight
entries: Your keen senses can focus to see the presence of magic. You gain the ability to cast the {@spell detect magic} spell, but only as a ritual. Your spellcasting ability for this spell is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. You can also cast this spell normally with any spell slots you have.

entries.name: Nimble Flight
entries: Thanks to your wings, you have a flying speed equal to your walking speed. When you fall, you can use your reaction to make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 10) to stop falling and fly in place until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Silent Feathers
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Stealth} skill.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: You are a Humanoid.

entries.name: Size
entries: You are Medium or Small. You choose the size when you gain this race.

entries.name: Hare-Trigger
entries: You add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

entries.name: Leporine Senses
entries: You gain proficiency in the {@skill 察觉} skill.

entries.name: Lucky Footwork
entries: When you fail a Dexterity saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d4} and add it to the result, potentially turning the failure into a success.

entries.name: Rabbit Hop
entries: Once during each of your turns when you walk at least 5 feet, you can hop, rolling a {@dice d12} and moving that many feet in a direction of your choice. This extra distance doesn't cost movement, but you can hop only if your speed isn't 0.

items.name: Type:
items.entry: Humanoid, as well as Construct or Undead (choose when you gain this lineage)

items.name: Size:
items.entry: Medium or Small (choose when you gain this lineage)

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light.

entries.name: Deathless Nature
entries: You have escaped death, a fact represented by the following benefits:

items: You have advantage on saving throws against disease and being {@condition 中毒}, and you have resistance to poison damage.
You have advantage on death saving throws.
You don't need to eat, drink, or breathe.
You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a long rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in an inactive, motionless state, during which you retain consciousness.

entries.name: Knowledge from a Past Life
entries: You temporarily remember sporadic glimpses of the past, perhaps faded memories from ages ago or a previous life. When you make an ability check that uses a skill, you can roll a {@dice d6} and add the number rolled to the check. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Revenant Subrace
entries: Having met a cruel and undeserved end, you have returned to the realm of the living. As a revenant, you thirst for revenge against those who wronged you in life, or seek to complete a final, critical task you left unfinished.

The revenant subrace can be applied to any race that has a subrace, and replaces that race's existing subrace options. Alternatively, you can apply this new subrace to a race without subrace options using the modification options provided below.

Your DM might also allow you to take this subrace for a slain character. In that case, your character rises from the dead with its original subrace replaced (or with the necessary modifications made to its base traits), filled with a determination to seek vengeance or complete its mission.

entries.name: Racial Adjustments
entries: For races that don't have subrace options, taking on the revenant subrace means making changes to your character's base traits, as follows. (This playtest article provides options only for human and dragonborn characters. Any other races which do not have subrace options should not be used with these revenant subrace rules.)

entries.name: Human Revenant
entries: If you want to play a human revenant, modify the human's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1. If you use the variant human traits, remove the Skills trait and the Feat trait.

entries.name: Dragonborn Revenant
entries: If you want to play a dragonborn revenant, modify the dragonborn's Ability Score Increase trait to the following: Your Strength score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 1. Additionally, your Draconic Ancestry trait uses necrotic damage as its damage type, replacing the damage type that applies to your breath weapon and your damage resistance.

entries.name: Tiefling Revenant
entries: A prior installment of Unearthed Arcana (That Old Black Magic) outlined two tiefling variants that make use of subraces. Use that article to make a tiefling revenant, replacing the subrace options with the revenant subrace options. The base tiefling traits from the article are as follows:

items.name: Ability Score Increase.
items.entry: Your Charisma score increases by 2.

items.name: Languages.
items.entry: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Relentless Nature
entries: Your DM assigns a goal to you—typically, one related to your character's death. The goal must be a specific task you can complete, such as slaying an enemy or liberating an area and its people. Until you fulfill that goal, you gain the following benefits:

items: If you are below half your hit point maximum at the start of your turn, you regain 1 hit point.

If you die, you return to life 24 hours after death. If your body is destroyed, you reform within 1 mile of the place of your death at a spot determined by the DM. If your equipment was also destroyed, you do not regain it.

You know the distance and direction between you and any creature involved in your goal, such as a person you seek vengeance against or someone you pledged to defend. This awareness fails if the creature is on another plane of existence.

entries: When your goal is complete, you finally find rest. You die and cannot be restored to life.

entries.name: Age
entries: Satyrs mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Satyrs delight in living a life free of the mantle of law. They gravitate toward being good, but some have devious streaks and enjoy causing dismay.

entries.name: Size
entries: Satyrs range from just under 5 feet to about 6 feet in height, with generally slender builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Fey
entries: Your creature type is fey, rather than humanoid.

entries.name: Ram
entries: You can use your head and horns to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to {@dice 1d4} + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Magic Resistance
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

entries.name: Mirthful Leaps
entries: Whenever you make a long or high jump, you can roll a {@dice d8} and add the number rolled to the number of feet you cover, even when making a standing jump. This extra distance costs movement as normal.

entries.name: Reveler
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 表演} and {@skill 说服} skills, and you have proficiency with one musical instrument of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

entries.name: Age
entries: Shifters are quick to mature both physically and emotionally, reaching young adulthood at age 10. They rarely live to be more than 70 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Shifters tend toward neutrality, being more focused on survival than concepts of good and evil. A love of personal freedom can drive shifters toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: As a bonus action, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a bonus action. When you shift, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You also gain additional benefits that depend on your shifter subrace, described below.
Once you shift, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 运动} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: Whenever you shift, you gain {@dice 1d6} additional temporary hit points. While shifted, you have a +1 bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Fierce
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 威吓} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, you can use your elongated fangs to make an unarmed strike as a bonus action. If you hit with your fangs, you can deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Graceful
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 体操} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, your walking speed increases by 10 feet. Additionally, you can move up to 10 feet as a reaction when a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of you. This reactive movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Natural Tracker
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill 生存} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, you have advantage on Wisdom checks, and no creature within 30 feet of you can make an attack roll with advantage against you, unless you're {@condition 无力}.

entries.name: Size
entries: Shifters are about the same size as humans. Your size is Medium

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Your lycanthropic heritage grants you the ability to see in dark conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: On your turn, you can shift as a bonus action. Shifting lasts for 1 minute or until you end it on your turn as a bonus action.
While shifting, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution bonus (minimum of 1). You also gain a feature that depends on your shifter subrace, described below.
You must finish a short or long rest before you can shift again.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Sylvan.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain a climb speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can use the {@action 疾走} action as a bonus action.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make a bite attack as an action. This is a melee weapon attack that uses Strength for its attack roll and damage bonus and deals {@dice 1d6} piercing damage. If this attack hits a target that is your size or smaller, the target is also {@condition 被擒}.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you can make an unarmed strike as a bonus action. You can use your Dexterity for its attack roll and damage bonus, and this attack deals slashing damage.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifting, you gain advantage on all Wisdom-based checks and saving throws.

entries.name: Age
entries: Shifters are quick to mature both physically and emotionally, reaching young adulthood at age 10. They rarely live to be more than 70 years old.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Shifters tend toward neutrality, being more focused on survival than concepts of good and evil. A love of personal freedom can drive shifters toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Shifters range from 5 to almost 7 feet tall, depending on their subrace. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Keen Senses
entries: You have proficiency with the {@skill 察觉} skill.

entries.name: Shifting
entries: As a bonus action, you can assume a more bestial appearance. This transformation lasts for 1 minute, until you die, or until you revert to your normal appearance as a bonus action. When you shift, you gain temporary hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 temporary hit point). You also gain additional benefits that depend on your shifter subrace, described below.
Once you shift, you can't do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Tough
entries: You have proficiency with the {@skill 运动} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: Whenever you shift, you gain {@dice 1d6} additional temporary hit points, and while shifted, you have a +1 bonus to your AC.

entries.name: Fierce
entries: You have proficiency with the {@skill 威吓} skill.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, you can use your elongated fangs to make an unarmed strike as a bonus action. If you hit with your fangs, you can deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Graceful
entries: You have proficiency with the {@skill 体操} skill.

entries.name: Swift Stride
entries: Your walking speed increases by 5 feet.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, your walking speed increases by 5 feet. Additionally, you can move up to 10 feet as a reaction when an enemy ends its turn within 5 feet of you. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

entries.name: Natural Tracker
entries: You have proficiency with the {@skill 生存} skill.

entries.name: Mark the Scent
entries: As a bonus action, you can mark one creature you can see within 10 feet of you. Until the end of your next long rest, your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make to find the marked creature, and you always know the location of that creature if it is within 60 feet of you. You can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Shifting Feature
entries: While shifted, you have advantage on Wisdom checks.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 混合体一出生就是个成年的人类、精灵、或维多肯。他们已稍快的速度老化，因此他们的最大寿命可能会有所减少。守护者计划运行的时间长度尚不足以观察这个现象对混合体的整体影响。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的混合体都跟析米克联合有着相同的中立观点。他们对科学研究和公会地位的兴致远高于道德伦理问题。然而，那些离开联合的混合体通常是因为他们的哲学观与其他公会更为一致。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 你的体型为中型，你的身高体重都落在作为你基底的类人种族的正常范围内。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和精灵语或维多肯语。

entries.name: 动物改造
entries: 你的身体已经被改造成包含某些动物的特征。你在现在选择一项动物改造，并在升至5级时选择第二项。
在1级时，从下列选项中选择一项：

items.name: 蝠鲼滑翼
items.entry: 你拥有如鳐类般的鱼鳍，让你可以将它们作为翅膀以减缓坠落速度或让你得以滑翔。当你坠落且并未{@condition 无力}时，你可以在计算坠落伤害时减去100尺的坠落高度，且每下降1尺，都可以让你水平移动最多2尺。

items.name: 灵敏攀爬者
items.entry: 你拥有等同于你步行速度的攀爬速度。

items.name: 水中适应
items.entry: 你可以在水下呼吸，且你拥有等同于你步行速度的游泳速度。

entries: 在5级时，你的身体进一步进化，发展出新的特征。选择一项你在1级时没有选择的选项，或从下列选项中选择一项：

items.name: 格斗附肢
items.entry: 在你的双臂旁长出了两个特殊的附肢。决定它们是爪子还是触手。以一个动作，你可以使用它们其中之一去尝试擒抱一个生物。它们两个都是天生武器，你可以使用它们来进行徒手打击。如果你以它命中目标，目标将受到等同1d6 + 你的力量调整值的钝击伤害，而不是一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。紧接在命中之后，你可以尝试以一个附赠动作对目标进行擒抱。这些附肢不能精准的操作任何东西，也不能使用武器、魔法物品、或其它专门的装备。

items.name: 甲壳
items.entry: 你的肌肤各处覆盖着厚重的甲壳。当你没有穿着重甲时，你的AC获得+1加值。

items.name: 酸液喷射
items.entry: 以一个动作，你可以从你嘴里的腺体对一个距离你30尺内且你所能看见的生物或物体喷出酸液。除非目标成功通过一次DC等同于8 + 你的体质调整值 + 你的熟练加值的敏捷豁免，否则它将受到{@dice 2d10}强酸伤害。这个伤害将在你的等级升至11级时增加至{@dice 3d10}，17级时{@dice 4d10}。你可以使用这项特性的次数等同于你的体质调整值（最少一次），且你在完成一次长休后恢复所有已使用的次数。

entries.name: Age
entries: Hybrids begin their lives as adult humans, elves, or vedalken. They exhibit signs of slightly accelerated aging, so their maximum lifespans are probably reduced somewhat, but the Guardian Project has not been operating long enough to observe the full effect of this phenomenon.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most hybrids share the generally neutral outlook of the Simic Combine as a whole. They are more interested in scientific research and the standing of their guild than in moral or ethical questions. However, those who leave the Combine often do so because their philosophical outlook and alignment are more in line with a different guild's.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium, within the normal range of your humanoid base race.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Animal Enhancement
entries: Your body has been altered to incorporate certain animal characteristics. You choose one animal enhancement now and a second enhancement at 5th level.
At 1st level, choose one of the following options:

items.name: Manta Glide
items.entry: Your ray-like wings can slow your fall and allow you to glide. When you fall and aren't {@condition 无力}, you can subtract up to 100 feet from the fall when calculating falling damage, and you can move up to 2 feet horizontally for every 1 foot you descend.

items.name: Nimble Climber
items.entry: You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

items.name: Underwater Adaptation
items.entry: You can breathe air and water, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries: At 5th level, choose one of the following options, or choose one of the options you didn't take at 1st level:

items.name: Grappling Appendage
items.entry: You have two special appendages growing alongside your arms. Choose whether they're both claws or tentacles. Each of these appendages is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike. Immediately after hitting, you can try to grapple the target as a bonus action. These appendages can't precisely manipulate anything and can't wield weapons, magic items, or other specialized equipment.

items.name: Carapace
items.entry: Your skin in places is covered by a thick shell. You gain a +1 bonus to AC when you're not wearing heavy armor.

items.name: Acid Spit
items.entry: As an action, you can spray a stream of acid from glands in your mouth, targeting one creature or object you can see within 30 feet of you. The target takes {@dice 2d10} acid damage unless it succeeds on a Dexterity saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. This damage increases by {@dice 1d10} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 3d10}) and 17th level ({@dice 4d10}).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Elvish.

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 大部分的赛壬倾向混乱阵营，珍惜着因加入海盗团而带来的自由与独立。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 赛壬的身高约为5到6尺，但他们的身躯相当纤细，骨头部分中空以利飞行。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 赛壬之歌
entries: 你知晓{@spell 交友术}戏法，且施放时无需任何材料构材。

entries.name: 飞行
entries: 你拥有30尺的飞行速度。你不能在穿着中甲或重甲时使用你的飞行速度。（如果你的战役使用了负重的变体规则，则你不能在你负载时使用你的飞行速度。）

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语（若存在于你的战役）和赛壬语。

entries.name: 易碎骸骨
entries: 你具有对钝击伤害的易伤。

entries.name: 不死本质
entries: 你免疫于毒素伤害和{@condition 力竭}状态，且你不会陷入{@condition 中毒}状态。你不再需要呼吸、进食、饮水、或睡眠。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你无法说话，但你可以理解任何你生前所知的语言。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 斑猫人有着与人类相同的寿命。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 由于他们放任冲动和幻想引导他们的方向，斑猫人倾向混乱阵营。他们很少是邪恶的，他们大部分是被好奇心所驱使，而非贪婪或者其他黑暗的冲动。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 斑猫人的身高平均比人类更高且相对更纤细。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你拥有猫的敏锐感官，特别是在黑暗中。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 猫科迅捷
entries: 你的反射神经和敏捷性让你能够以爆发性的速度移动。当你在战斗中于你的回合移动时，你可以将你的移动速度变为二倍，持续直到该回合结束。一旦你使用此特性，直到你在你的其中一个回合移动0尺之前，你都不能再使用它。

entries.name: 猫之利爪
entries: 由于你的利爪，你拥有20尺的攀爬速度。此外，你的利爪是一种天生武器，且你可以用它来进行徒手打击。如果你以它们命中目标，则你造成等同1d4 + 你的力量调整值的挥砍伤害，而非一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 猫之天赋
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 察觉}和{@skill 隐匿}技能。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和另一种你所选择的语言。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 提夫林的成熟速度和人类相同，但可以比人类多活个几年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 提夫林也许并没有倾向邪恶的天性，但他们之中许多最终都步向邪恶。无论邪恶与否，他们独立的天性使许多提夫林都偏向了混乱阵营。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 提夫林的身材和体型与人类大致相同。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 多亏于你的炼狱血脉，你在黑暗与微光环境下仍能保持卓越视觉。你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 炼狱抗性
entries: 你具有对火焰伤害的抗性。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语和炼狱语。

entries.name: Abyssal Arcana
entries: Each time you finish a long rest, you gain the ability to cast cantrips and spells randomly determined from a short list. At 1st level, you can cast a cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can also cast a 1st-level spell. At 5th level, you can cast a 2nd-level spell.

You can cast a spell gained from this trait only once until you complete your next long rest. You can cast a cantrip gained from this trait at will, as normal. For 1st-level spells whose effect changes if cast using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you cast the spell as if using a 2nd-level slot. Spells of 2nd level are cast as if using a 2nd-level slot

At the end of each long rest, you lose the cantrips and spells previously granted by this feature, even if you did not cast them. You replace those cantrips and spells by rolling for new ones on the Abyssal Arcana Spells table. Roll separately for each cantrip and spell. If you roll the same spell or cantrip you gained at the end of your previous long rest, roll again until you get a different result.

entries.name: Abyssal Fortitude
entries: Your hit point maximum increases by half your level (minimum 1).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Abyssal.

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 致病射线} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 疯狂冠冕} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Maladomini
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 致病射线} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 疯狂冠冕} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Dis
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 易容术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 侦测思想} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Dis
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 易容术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 隐形术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
entries: You know the {@spell 交友术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 魅惑人类} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 暗示术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Phlegethos
entries: You know the {@spell 交友术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 魅惑人类} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 暗示术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Malbolge
entries: You know the {@spell 次级幻象} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 易容术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 隐形术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Malbolge
entries: You know the {@spell 次级幻象} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 易容术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 隐形术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: You know the {@spell 冷冻射线} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 艾嘉西斯之铠} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 黑暗术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Stygia
entries: You know the {@spell 冷冻射线} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 艾嘉西斯之铠} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 黑暗术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Minauros
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 谭森浮碟术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 秘法锁} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Minauros
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 谭森浮碟术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a short or long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 秘法锁} spell once with this trait, requiring no material component, and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 燃烧之手} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 火焰刀} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Cania
entries: You know the {@spell 法师之手} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 魔法飞弹} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 蛛网术} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Appearance
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Devil's Tongue
entries: You know the {@spell 恶毒嘲笑} cantrip. When your reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 魅惑人类} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 注目术} spell once with this trait. You must finish a long rest to cast these spells once again with this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them. This trait replaces the Infernal Legacy trait.

entries.name: Appearance
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Hellfire
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 燃烧之手} spell once per day as a 2nd-level spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the {@spell 黑暗术} spell; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Appearance
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Appearance
entries: Your tiefling might not look like other tieflings. Rather than having the physical characteristics described in the Player's Handbook, choose {@dice 1d4+1} of the following features: small horns; fangs or sharp teeth; a forked tongue; catlike eyes; six fingers on each hand; goatlike legs; cloven hoofs; a forked tail; leathery or scaly skin; red or dark blue skin; cast no shadow or reflection; exude a smell of brimstone.

entries.name: Winged
entries: You have bat-like wings sprouting from your shoulder blades. You have a flying speed of 30 feet while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 炽炎斩} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 烙印斩} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Legacy of Avernus
entries: You know the {@spell 奇术} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the {@spell 炽炎斩} spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the {@spell 烙印斩} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 年轻的龟人在出生后学会双脚行走前，会爬行移动持续数周的时间。他们会在15岁成年，且平均可以活50年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 龟人倾向过着有序、仪式化的生活。他们发展许多风俗和惯例，并且随着年岁增长变得因循守旧。他们大部分是守序善良。少部分会自私贪婪，并更倾向邪恶阵营，但摆脱守序而偏爱混乱对于龟人而言相当不寻常。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 成年龟人的身高为5到6尺高且平均450磅重。他们龟壳的重量大概占了他们体重的三分之一。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 爪抓
entries: 你的利爪是一种天生武器，且你可以用它来进行徒手打击。如果你以它们命中目标，则你造成等同1d4 + 你的力量调整值的挥砍伤害，而非一般徒手打击的钝击伤害。

entries.name: 屏息
entries: 你可以屏住你的呼吸长达1小时。龟人并非天生的游泳健将，但他们在需要浮出水面呼吸空气之前，可以待在水中好一段时间。

entries.name: 天生护甲
entries: 由于你的龟壳和你身体的形状，你并不适合穿戴护甲。然而，你的龟壳将提供充足的防护；它使你的基础AC变为17（你的敏捷调整值并不会影响这个数字）。你无法获得穿戴护甲的好处，但若你使用盾牌，你仍然可以正常应用盾牌的加值。

entries.name: 龟壳防御
entries: 你能够以一个动作缩回壳内。直到你出壳，你的AC将获得+4加值，且你在力量和体质豁免中具有优势。当你躲在龟壳内时，你处于{@condition 伏地}状态，你的移动速度归零且无法被提升，你在敏捷豁免中具有劣势，你无法采取反应，且你唯一能做的动作是以一个附赠动作从龟壳里出来。

entries.name: 生存本能
entries: 你熟练于{@skill 生存}技能。龟人磨练出了优秀的生存本能。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你能够说、读、写通用语和水族语。

items.name: Alignment
entries: Tritons tend toward neutrality. Their culture encourages them to be mindful of life's currents, knowing when to harness fate's tides and when to flow along with them.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 梭螺鱼人在大约15岁时成年，且可以活到最多200年。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 梭螺鱼人倾向守序善良。身为海洋中最黑暗边疆的守护者，他们的文化推动他们走向秩序和仁慈。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 梭螺鱼人比人类稍微矮一些，身高平均为5尺高。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 游泳速度
entries: 你拥有30尺的游泳速度。

entries.name: 两栖
entries: 你可以在空气和水中呼吸。

entries.name: 控风操水
entries: 身为海洋之子，你可以呼唤气和水元素的魔法。你可以使用此特性施放{@spell 云雾术}。从3级开始，你可以使用此特性施放{@spell 造风术}，且从5级开始，你也可以使用此特性施放{@spell 水墙术|xge}。一旦你使用此特性施放一个法术，则直到你完成一次长休之前你都不能再用此特性施放该法术。你施展这些法术的施法属性为魅力。

entries.name: 海之使者
entries: 水生野兽与你的族人之间有着非凡的亲和力。你可以与能在水中呼吸的野兽进行简单概念的沟通。牠们可以理解你话语的意思，然而你并没有特殊能力以理解牠们的回复。

entries.name: 深海守护者
entries: 适应了最极端的深海环境，你具有对冷冻伤害的抗性，且你忽视任何因深水环境所造成的负面影响。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语以及原初语。

entries.name: 变色皮肤
entries: 你在为躲藏所进行的敏捷（{@skill 隐匿}）检定中具有优势。

entries.name: 恶臭
entries: 任何除了战蜥人以外在距离你5尺内开始它的回合的生物都必须成功通过一次DC 12的体质豁免，否则陷入{@condition 中毒}状态直到该生物的下个回合开始。若此豁免成功，该生物将免疫于所有战蜥人的恶臭长达1小时。

entries.name: 日光敏感
entries: 当处于日光照耀下时，你在攻击检定，以及依赖视觉的感知（{@skill 察觉}）检定中具有劣势。

entries.name: 天生护甲
entries: 你的厚皮让你的护甲等级获得+1加值。

entries.name: 黑暗视觉
entries: 你在看距离你60尺范围内的事物时，微光的照明程度对你而言视作明亮，黑暗则视作微光。你无法辨别黑暗中的颜色，而只能看到灰黑的轮廓。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写战蜥人语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vampires might not have an innate tendency toward evil, but many of them end up there. Evil or not, their strict hierarchies incline them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Vampires are the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Bloodthirst
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition 被擒} by you, {@condition 无力}, or {@condition 束缚}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces it's hit point maximum to 0.

entries.name: Feast of Blood
entries: When you drain blood with your Bloodthirst ability, you experience a surge of vitality. Your speed increases by 10 feet, and you gain advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks and saving throws for 1 minute.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common (if it exists in your campaign) and Vampire.

entries.name: Age
entries: Vampires don't mature and age in the same way that other races do. Every living vampire is either a bloodchief, infected by Ulamog's influence in the distant reaches of history, or was spawned by a bloodchief from a living human. Most vampires are thus very old, but few have any memory of their earliest years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vampires have no innate tendency toward evil, but consuming the life energy of other creatures often pushes them to that end. Regardless of their moral bent, the strict hierarchies of their bloodchiefs inclines them toward a lawful alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Vampires are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Blood Thirst
entries: You can drain blood and life energy from a willing creature, or one that is {@condition 被擒} by you, {@condition 无力}, or {@condition 束缚}. Make a melee attack against the target. If you hit, you deal 1 piercing damage and {@dice 1d6} necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and you regain hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid killed in this way becomes a {@creature zombie||null}.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Vampire.

entries.name: Vampiric Resistance
entries: You have resistance to necrotic damage.

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 维多肯的成长比人类来的缓慢，大约在40岁左右成年。他们的寿命通常是350岁，但有些人可以活到500岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 维多肯通常是守序且非邪恶的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 高且纤瘦，维多肯的身高平均介于6至6½尺之间，且体重通常少于200磅。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 维多肯式沉着
entries: 你在所有智力、感知、和魅力的豁免检定上具有优势。

entries.name: 孜孜不倦的专家
entries: 你熟练于以下其中一个你所选择的技能：{@skill 奥秘}、{@skill 历史}、{@skill 调查}、{@skill 医疗}、{@skill 表演}或{@skill 巧手}。你也熟练于一个你所选择的工具。
每当你进行一次使用所选的工具或技能的属性检定时，骰一颗D4，并将骰出来的数字加到该检定的总和中。

entries.name: 部分两栖
entries: 借由通过你的肌肤吸收氧气，你可以在水下呼吸长达1小时。一旦你到达这个极限，直到你完成一次长休之前都不能再使用这个能力。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语、维多肯语、和另一种你所选择的语言。

entries.name: 年龄
entries: 维多肯的成熟速度与人类相同，且大多被期许在40岁左右时进入成年生活。他们的寿命可达350岁到甚至500岁。

entries.name: 阵营
entries: 维多肯通常是守序阵营，且很少是邪恶的。

entries.name: 体型
entries: 维多肯比人类更高而纤瘦。他们的身高平均介于6至6又1/2尺之间，且体重通常少于200磅。你的体型为中型。

entries.name: 语言
entries: 你可以说、读、写通用语。

entries.name: Age
entries: Vedalken mature at the same rate humans do, and most are expected to settle down into an adult life by around age 40. They can live 350 to almost 500 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Vedalken are most often lawful and rarely evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Vedalken are taller than humans but more slender. They average 6 to 6½ feet tall, but usually weigh less than 200 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Vedalken Dispassion
entries: You have advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

entries.name: Tireless Precision
entries: You are proficient in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill 奥秘}, {@skill 历史}, {@skill 调查}, {@skill 医疗}, {@skill 表演}, or {@skill 巧手}. You are also proficient with one {@book tool|phb|5|tools} of your choice.
Whenever you make an ability check with the chosen skill or tool, roll a {@dice d4}, and add the number rolled to the check's total.

entries.name: Age
entries: Verdan reach adulthood at around the age of 24, and it is thought that they might live to nearly 200 years old. However, because no verdan has died of old age since the race's initial creation, their upper age limits remain subject to speculation.

entries.name: Alignment
